4449.verse: In hiya illaa mawtatunal uulaa wa maa nahnu bimun shariin

4451.verse: Ahum khayrun am qawmu Tubba'inw wallaziina min qablihim; ahlaknaahum innahum kaanuu mujrimiin

4452.verse: Wa maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa baina humaa laa'ibiin

4453.verse: Maa khalaqnaahumaaa illaa bilhaqqi wa laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamuun

4455.verse: Yawma laa yughnii mawlan 'am mawlan shai'anw wa laa hum yunsaruun

4456.verse: Illaa mar rahimal laah' innahuu huwal 'aziizur rahiim

4462.verse: Summa subbuu fawqa raasihii min 'azaabil hamiim

4464.verse: Inna haazaa maa kuntum bihii tamtaruun

4467.verse: Yalbasuuna min sundusinw wa istbraqim mutaqaabiliin

4470.verse: Laa yazuuquuna fiihal mawtaa illal mawtatal uulaa wa qaqaahum 'azaabal jahiim

4471.verse: Fadlam mir rabbik; zaalika huwal fawzul 'aziim

4472.verse: Fa innamaa yassarnaahu bilisaanika la'allahum yatazakkaruun

4476.verse: Innaa fis samaawaati wal ardi la Aayaatil lilmu'miniin

4477.verse: Wa fii khalaqikum wa maa yabussu min daaabbatin Aayaatul liqawminy-yuuqinuun

4478.verse: Wakhtilaafil laili wannahaari wa maaa anzalal laahu minas samaaa'i mir rizqin fa ahyaa bihil arda ba'da mawtihaa wa tasriifir riyaahi Aayaatul liqawminy ya'qiluun

4479.verse: Tilka Aayatul laahi natluuhaa 'alika bilhaqq, fabiayyi hadiisim ba'dal laahi wa Aayaatihii yu'minuun

4481.verse: Yasma'u Aayaatil laahi tutlaa 'alaihi summa yusirru mustakbiran ka-al lam yasma'haa fabashshirhu bi'azaabin aliim

4482.verse: Wa izaa 'alima min Aayaatinaa shai'anit takhazahaa huzuwaa; ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabum muhiin

4483.verse: Minw waraaa'ihim Jahannamu wa laa yughnii 'anhum maa kasabuu shai'anw wa laa mat takhazuu min duunil laahi awliyaaa'a wa lahum 'azaabun 'aziim

4484.verse: Haazaa hudanw wal laziina kafaruu bi aayaati Rabbihim lahum 'azaabum mir rijzin aliim

4485.verse: Allaahul lazii sahkhara lakumul bahra litajriyal fulku fiihi bi amrihii wa litabtaghuu min fadlihii wa la'allakum tashkuruun

4486.verse: Wa sakhkhara lakum maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi jamii'am minh; inna fiizaalika la Aayaatil liqawminy yatafakkaruun

4487.verse: Qul lillaziina aamanuu yaghfiruu lillaziina laa yarjuuna ayyaamal laahi liyajziya qawmam bimaa kaanuu yaksibuun

4488.verse: Maa 'amila saalihan falinafsihii wa man asaaa'a fa'alaihaa summa ilaa Rabbikum turja'uun

4489.verse: Wa laqad aatainaa Baniie Israaa'iilal Kitaaba walhukma wan Nubuwwata wa razaqnaahum minat taiyibaati wa faddalnaahum;alal 'aalamiin

4490.verse: Wa aatainaahum baiyinaatim minal amri famakh talafuuu illaa mim ba'di maa jaaa'ahumul 'ilmu baghyam bainahum; inna Rabbaka yaqdii bainahum Yawmal Qiyaamati fiimaa kaanuu fiihi yakhtalifuun

4491.verse: Summa ja'alnaaka 'alaa sharii'atim minal amri fattabi'haa wa laa tattabi'ahwaaa'al-laziina laa ya'lamuun

4492.verse: Innahum lany yughnuu 'anka minal laahi shai'aa; wa innaz zaalimiina ba'duhum awliyaaa'u ba'dinw wallaahu waliyyul muttaqiin

4493.verse: Haazaa basaaa'iru linnaasi wa hudanw wa rahmatul liqawminy yuuqinuun

4494.verse: Am hasibal laziinaj tarahus saiyiaati an naj'alahum kallaziina aamanuu wa 'amilu saalihaati sawaaa'am mahyaahum wa mamaatuhum; saaa'a maa yahkumuun

4495.verse: Wa khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal arda bilhaqqi wa litujzaa kullu nafsim bimaa kasabat wa hum laa yuzlamuun

4496.verse: Afara'ayta manit takhaza ilaahahuu hawaahu wa adal lahul laahu 'alaa 'ilminw wa khatama 'alaa sam'ihii wa qalbihii wa ja'ala 'alaa basarihii ghishaawatan famany yahdiihi mim ba'dil laah; afalaa tazakkaruun

4497.verse: Wa qaaluu maa hiya illaa hayaatunad dunyaa namuutu wa nahyaa wa maa yuhlikunaaa illad dahr; wa maa lahum bizaalika min 'ilmin in hum illaayazunnuun

4498.verse: Wa izaa tutlaa 'alaihim aayaatuna baiyinaatim maa kaana hujjatahum illaaa an qaalu'tuu bi aabaaa'inaaa in kuntum saadiqiin

4499.verse: Qulil laahu yuhyiikum summa yumiitukum summa yajma'ukum ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati laa raiba fiihi wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa ya'lamuun

4500.verse: Wa lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal ard; wa Yawma taquumus Saa'atu Yawma 'iziny yakhsarul mubtiluun

4501.verse: Wa taraa kulla ummatin jaasiyah; kullu ummatin tud'aaa ilaa kitaabihaa al Yawma tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maluun

4502.verse: Haazaa kitaabunaa yantiqu 'alaikum bilhaqq; innaa kunnaa nastansikhu maa kuntum ta'maluun

4503.verse: Fa ammal laziina aamaanuu wa 'amilus saalihaati fayudkhiluhum Rabbuhum fii rahmatih; zaalika huwal fawzul mubiin

4504.verse: Wa ammal laziina kafaruuu afalam takun Aayaatii tutlaa 'alaikum fastakbartum wa kuntum qawmam mujrimiin

4505.verse: Wa izaa qiila inna wa'dallaahi haqqunw was Saa'atu laa raiba fiihaa qultum maa nadrii mas Saa'atu in nazunnu illaa zannanw wa maa nahnu bimustaiqiniin

4506.verse: Wa badaa lahum saiyiaatu maa 'amiluu wa haaqa bihim maa kaanuu bihii yastahzi'uun

4507.verse: Wa qiilal yawma nansaakum kamaa nasiitum liqaaa'a yawmikum haazaa wa maawaakumun Naaru wa maa lakum min naasiriin

4508.verse: Zaalikum bi annakumut takhaztum aayaatil laahi huzuwanw wa gharratkumul hayaatud dunyaa; fal yawma laa yukhrajuuna minhaa wa laahum yusta'tabuun

4509.verse: Falillaahil hamdu Rabbis samaawaati wa Rabbil ardi Rabbil-'aalamiin

4510.verse: Wa lahul kibriyaaa'u fissamaawaati wal ardi wa Huwal 'Aziizul Hakiim

4513.verse: Maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaaa illaa bilhaqqi wa ajalim musammaa; wallaziina kafaruu 'ammaaa unziruu mu'riduun

4514.verse: Qul ara'aytum maa tad'uuna min duunil laahi aruunii maazaa khalaquu minal ardi am lahum shirkun fis samaawaati iituunii bi kitaabim min qabli haazaaa aw asaaratim min 'ilmin in kuntum saadiqiin

4515.verse: Wa man adallu mimmany yad'uu min duunil laahi mallaa yastajiibu lahuuu ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati wa hum'an du'aaa'ihim ghaafiluun

4516.verse: Wa izaa hushiran naasu kaanuu lahum a'daaa'anw wa kaanuu bi'ibaadatihim kaafiriin

4517.verse: Wa izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaalal laziina kafaruu lilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum haazaa sihrum mubiin

4518.verse: Am yaquuluunaf taraahu qul inif taraituhuu falaa tamlikuuna lii minal laahi shai'an Huwa a'lamu bimaa tufiiduuna fiihi kafaa bihii shahiidam bainii wa bainakum wa Huwal Ghafuurur Rahiim

4519.verse: Qul maa kuntu bid'am minal Rusuli wa maaa adriie ma yuf'alu bii wa laa bikum in attabi'u illaa maa yuuhaaa ilaiya ya maaa ana illaa naziirum mubiin

4520.verse: Qul ara'aytum in kaana min 'indil laahi wa kafartum bihii wa shahida shaahidum mim Banii Israaa'iila 'alaa mislihii fa aamana wastak bartum innal laaha laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimiin

4521.verse: Wa qaalal laziina kafaruu lillaziina aamanuu law kaana khairam maa sabaquunaaa ilyh; wa iz lam yahtaduu bihii fasa yaquuluuna haazaaa ifkun qadiim

4522.verse: Wa min qablihii kitaabu muusaaa imaamanw-wa rahmah; wa haazaa Kitaabum musad diqul lisaanan 'Arabiyyal liyunziral laziina zalamuu wa bushraa lilmuhsiniin

4523.verse: Innal laziina qaaluu Rabbunal laahu summas taqaamuu falaa khawfun 'alaihim wa laahum yahzanuun

4524.verse: Ulaaa'ika Ashabul Jannati khaalidiina fiihaa jazaaa'am bimaa kaano ya'maluun

4525.verse: Wa wassainal insaana biwaalidaihi ihsaanan hamalathu ummuhuu kurhanw-wa wada'athu kurhanw wa hamluhuu wa fisaaluhuu salaasuuna shahraa; hattaaa izaa balagha ashuddahuu wa balagho arba'iina sanatan qaala Rabbi aqzi'niie an ashkura ni'matakal latiie an'amta 'alaiya wa 'alaa waalidaiya wa an a'mala saalihan tardaahu wa aslih lii fii zurriyyatii innii tubtu ilaika wa innii minal muslimiin

4526.verse: Ulaaa'ikal laziina nata qabbalu 'anhum ahsana maa 'amiluu wa natajaawazu 'an saiyiaatihim fiie Ashaabil jannati Wa'das sidqil lazii kaanuu yuu'aduun

4527.verse: Wallazii qaala liwaali daihi uffil lakumaaa ata'idaniniie an ukhraja wa qad khalatil quruunu min qablii wa humaa yastaghiisaanil laaha wailaka aamin inna wa'dal laahi haqq, fa yaquulu maa haazaaa illaaa asaatiirul awwaliin

4528.verse: Ulaaa'ikal laziina haqqa 'alaihimul qawlu fiie umamin qad khalat min qablihim minal jinni wal insi innahum kaanuu khaasiriin

4529.verse: Wa likullin darajaatum mimmaa 'amiluu wa liyuwaf fiyahum a'maalahum wa hum laa yuzlamuun

4530.verse: Wa Yawma yu'radul laziina kafaruu 'alan Naai azhabtum taiyibaatikum fii hayaatikumud dunyaa wastam ta'tum bihaa fal Yawma tujzawna 'azaabal huuni bimaa kuntum tastakbiruuna fil ardi bighairil haqqi wa bimaa kuntum tafsuquun

4531.verse: Wazkur akhaa 'Aad, iz anzara qawmahuu bil Ahqaafi wa qad khalatin nuzuru mim baini yadaihi wa min khalfihiie allaa ta'buduuu illal laaha inniie akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin 'aziim

4532.verse: Qaaluu aji'tanaa litaa fikanaa 'an aalihatinaa faatinaa bimaa ta'idunaaa in kunta minas saadiqiin

4533.verse: Qaala innamal 'ilmu indal laahi wa uballighukum maaa uriltu bihii wa laakinniie araakum qawman tajhaluun

4534.verse: Falammaa ra awhu 'aaridam mustaqbila awdiyatihim qaaluu haazaa 'aaridum mumtirunaa; bal huwa masta'jaltum bihii riihun fiihaa 'azaabun aliim

4535.verse: Tudammiru kulla shai'im bi-amri Rabbihaa fa asbahuu laa yuraaa illaa masaakinuhum; kazaalika najzil qawmal mujrimiin

4536.verse: Wa laqad makkannaahum fiimaaa im makkannaakum fiihi waj'alnaa lahum sam'anw wa absaaranw wa af'idatan famaaa aghnaa 'anhum samu'uhum wa laaa absaaruhum wa laaa af'idatuhum min shai'in iz kaanuu yajhaduuna bi Aayaatil laahi wa haaqa bihim maa kaanuu bihii yastahzi'uun

4537.verse: Wa laqad ahlaknaa ma hawlakum minal quraa wa sarrafnal Aayaati la'allahum yarji'uun

4538.verse: Falaw laa nasarahumul laziinat takhazuu min duunil laahi qurbaanan aalihatam bal dalluu 'anhum' wa zaalika ifkuhum wa maa kaanuu yaftaruun

4539.verse: Wa iz sarafinaaa ilaika nafaram minal jinni yastami'uunal Quraana falammaa hadaruuhu qaaluuu ansituu falammaa qudiya wallaw ilaa qawmihim munziriin

4540.verse: Qaaluu yaa qawmanaaa innaa sami'naa Kitaaban unzila mim ba'di muusa musaddiqal limaa baina yadihi yahdiie ilal haqqi wa ilaa Tariiqim Mustaqiim

4541.verse: Yaa qawmanaaa ajiibuu daa'iyal laahi wa aaminuu bihii yaghfir lakum min zunuubikum wa yujirkum min 'azaabin aliim

4542.verse: Wa mal laa yujib daa'iyal laahi falaisa bimu'jizin fil ardi wa laisa lahuu min duunihiie awliyaaa'; ulaaa ika fii dalaalim mubiin

4543.verse: Awalam yaraw annal laahal lazii khalaqas samaawaati wal larda wa lam ya'ya bikhal qihinna biqaadirin 'alaaa anyyuhiyal mawtaa; balaaa innahuu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadiir

4544.verse: Wa Yawma yu'radul laziina kafaruu 'alan naari alaisa haaza bil haqq; qaaluu balaa wa Rabbinaa; qaala fazuuqul 'azaaba bimaa kuntum takfuruun

4545.verse: Fasbir kamaa sabara ulul 'azmi minar Rusuli wa laa tasta'jil lahum; ka annahum Yawma yarawna maa yuu'aduuna lam yalbasuuu illaa saa'atam min nahaar; balaagh; fahal yuhlaku illal qawmul faasiquun

4546.verse: Allaziina kafaruu wa sadduu'an sabiilil laahi adalla a'maalahum

4547.verse: Wallaziina aamanuu wa 'amilus saalihaati wa aamanuu bimaa nuzzila 'alaa Muhammadinw-wa huwal haqqu mir Rabbihim kaffara 'anhum saiyiaatihim wa aslaha baalahum

4548.verse: Zaalika bi annal laziina kafarut taba'ul baatila wa annal laziina aamanut taba'ul haqqa mir Rabbihim; kazaalika yadribul laahu linnaasi amsaalahum

4549.verse: Fa-izaa laqiitumul laziina kafaruu fadarbar riqaab, hattaaa izaa askhan tumuuhum fashuddul wasaaq, fa immaa mannnam ba'du wa immaa fidaaa'an hattaa tada'al harbu awzaarahaa; zaalika wa law yashaaa'ul laahu lantasara minhum wa laakil laiyabluwa ba'dakum biba'd; wallaziina qutiluu fii sabiilil laahi falany yudilla a'maalahum

4552.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina aamanuuu in tansurul laaha yansurkum wa yusabbit aqdaamakum

4553.verse: Wallaziina kafaruu fata's al lahum wa adalla a'maalahum

4554.verse: Zaalika bi annahum karihuu maaa anzalal laahu faahbata a'maalahum

4555.verse: Afalam yasiiruu fil ardi fayanzuruu kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul laziina min qablihim; dammaral laahu 'alaihim wa lilkaafiriina amsaaluhaa

4556.verse: Zaalika bi annal laaha mawlal laziina aamanuu wa annal kaafiriina laa mawlaa lahum

4557.verse: Innal-laaha yudkhilul laziina aamanuu wa 'amilus saalihaati Jannaatin tajrii min tahtihal anhaaru wallaziina kafaruu yatamatta'uuna wa yaakuluuna kamaa taakuluian'aamu wan Naaru maswallahum

4558.verse: Wa ka ayyim min qaryatin hiya ashaddu quwwatam min qaryatikal latiie akhrajatka ahlaknaahum falaa naasira lahum

4559.verse: Afaman kaana 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbihii kaman zuyyina lahuu suuu'u 'amalihii wattaba'uuu ahwaaa'ahum

4560.verse: Masalul jannatil latii wu'idal muttaquuna fiihaaa anhaarum mim maaa'in ghayri aasininw wa anhaarum mil labanil lam yataghaiyar ta'muhuu wa anhaarum min khamril lazzatil lishshaaribiina wa anhaarum min 'asalim musaffanw wa lahum fiiha min kullis samaraati wa maghfiratum mir Rabbihim kaman huwa khaalidun fin naari wa suquu maaa'an hamiiman faqatta'a am'aaa'ahum

4561.verse: Wa minhum mai yastami' ilaika hattaaa izaa kharajuu min 'indika qaaluu lillaziina uutul 'ilma maazaa qaala aanifaa; ulaaa'ikal laziina taba'al laahu 'alaa quluubihim wattaba'uuu ahwaaa'ahum

4562.verse: Wallaziinah tadaw zaadahum hudanw wa aataahum taqwaahum

4563.verse: Fahal yanzuruuna illas Saa'ata an taatiyahum baghtatan faqad jaaa'a ashraatuhaa; fa-annnaa lahum izaa jaaa'at hum zikraahum

4564.verse: Fa'lam annahuu laaa ilaaha illal laahu wastaghfir lizambika wa lilmu'miniina walmu'minaat; wallaahu ya'lamu mutaqallabakum wa maswaakum

4565.verse: Wa yaquulul laziina aamanuu law laa nuzzilat Suuratun fa izaaa unzilat Suuratum Muhkamatunw wa zukira fiihal qitaalu ra aytal laziina fii quluubihim maraduny yanzuruuna ilaika nazaral maghshiyyi 'alaihi minal mawti fa'awlaa lahum

4566.verse: Taa'atunw wa qawlum ma'ruuf; fa izaa 'azamal amru falaw sadaqul laaha lakaana khairal lahum

4567.verse: Fahal 'asaitum in tawallaitum an tufsiduu fil ardi wa tuqatti'uuu arhaamakum

4568.verse: Ulaaa'ikal laziina la'anahumul laahu fa asammahum wa a'maaa absaarahum

4569.verse: Afalaa yatadabbaruunal Qur-aana am 'alaa quluubin aqfaaluhaa

4570.verse: Innal laziinar tadduu 'alaaa adbaarihim mim ba'di maa tabaiyana lahumul hudash Shaitaanu sawwala lahum wa amlaa lahum

4571.verse: Zaalika bi annahum qaaluu lillaziina karihuu maa nazzalal laahu sanutii'ukum fii ba'dil amri wallaahu ya'lamu israarahum

4572.verse: Fakaifa izaa tawaffat humul malaaa'ikatu yadribuuna wujuuhahum wa adbaa rahum

4573.verse: Zaalika bi annahumut taba'uu maaa askhatal laaha wa karihuu ridwaanahuu fa ahbata a'maalahum

4574.verse: Am hasibal laziina fii quluubihim maradun al lan yukhrijal laahu adghaanahum

4575.verse: Wa law nashaaa'u la-arainaakahum fala 'araftahum bi siimaahum; wa lata'rifan nahum fii lahnil qawl; wallaahu ya'lamu a'maalakum

4576.verse: Wa lanabluwannakum hattaa na'lamal mujaahidiina minkum wassaabiriina wa nabluwa akhbaarakum

4577.verse: Innnal laziina kafaruu wa sadduu 'an sabiilil laahi wa shaaaqqur Rasuula mim ba'di maa tabaiyana lahumul hudaa lany yadurrul laaha shai'anw wa sa yuhbitu a'maalahum

4578.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina aamanuu atii'ul laaha wa atii'ur Rasuula wa laa tubtiluuu a'maalakum

4579.verse: Innal laziina kafaruu wa sadduu 'an sabiilil laahi summa maatuu wa hum kuffaarun falany yaghfirallaahu lahum

4580.verse: Falaa tahinuu wa tad'uuu ilas salmi wa antumul a'lawna wallaahu ma'akum wa lany yatirakum a'maalakum

4581.verse: Innamal hayaatud dunyaa la'ibunw wa lahw; wa in to'minuu wa tattaquu yu'tikum ujuurakum wa laa yas'alkum amwaalakum

4582.verse: Iny yas'alkumuuhaa fa yuhfikum tabkhaluu wa yukhrij adghaanakum

4583.verse: haaa antum haaa'ulaaa'i tud'awna litunfiquu fii sabiilillaahi faminkum many yabkhalu wa many yabkhal fa innamaa yabkhalu 'an nafsih; wallaahu Ghaniyyu wa antumul fuqaraaa'; wa in tatwal law yastabdil qawman ghairakum summa laa yakuunuuu amsaalakum

4585.verse: Liyaghfira lakal laahu maa taqaddama min zambika wa maa ta akhkhara wa yutimma ni'matahuu 'alaika wa yahdiyaka siraatam mustaqiima

4587.verse: Huwal laziie anzalas sakiinata fii quluubil mu'miniina liyazdaaduuu iimaanamma'a iimaanihim; wa lillaahi junuudus samawaati wal ard; wa kaanal laahu 'Aliiman Hakiimaa

4588.verse: Liyudkhilal mu'miniina walmu'minaati jannaatin tajrii min tahtihal anhaaru khaalidiina fiihaa wa yukaffira 'anhum saiyi aatihim; wa kaana zaalika 'indal laahi fawzan 'aziimaa

4589.verse: Wa yu'azzibal munaafiqiina walmunaafiqaati wal mushrikiina walmushrikaatiz zaaanniina billaahi zannas saw'; 'alaihim daaa'iratus saw'i wa ghadibal laahu 'alaihim wa la'anahum wa a'adda lahum jahannama wa saaa' at masiiraa

4590.verse: Wa lillaahi junuudus samaawaati wal ard; wa kaanal laahu 'aziizan hakiima

4591.verse: Innaaa arsalnaaka shaahi danw wa mubashshiranw wa naziira

4592.verse: Litu minuu billaahi wa Rasuulihii wa tu'azziruuhu watuwaqqiruuhu watusabbi huuhu bukratanw wa asiilaa

4593.verse: Innal laziina yubaayi'uunaka innamaa yubaayi'uunal laaha yadul laahi fawqa aydehim; faman nakasa fainnamaa yuankusu 'alaa nafsihii wa man awfaa bimaa 'aahada 'alihul laaha fasa yu'tiihi ajran 'aziimaa

4594.verse: Sa yaquulu lakal mukhal lafuuna minal-A'raabi shaighalatnaaa amwaalunaa wa ahluunaa fastaghfir lanaa; yaquuluuna bi alsinatihim maa laisa fii quluubihim; qul famany yamliku lakum minal laahi shai'an in araada bikum darran aw araada bikum naf'aa; bal kaanal laahu bimaa ta'maluuna Khabiiraa

4595.verse: Bal zanantum al lany yanqalibar Rasuulu walmu'minuuna ilaaa ahliihim abadanw wa zuyyina zaalika fii quluubikum wa zanantum zannnas saw'i wa kuntum qawmam buuraa

4596.verse: Wa mal lam yu'mim billaahi wa Rasuulihii fainnaaa a'tadnaa lilkaafiriina sa'iiraa

4597.verse: Wa lillaahii mulkus samaawaati wal ard; yaghfiru limany yashaaa'u wa yu'azzibu many yashaaa'; wa kaanal laahu Ghafuurar Rahiimaa

4598.verse: Sa yaquulul mukhalla fuuna izan talaqtum ilaa maghaanima litaakhuzuuhaa zaruunaa nattabi'kum yuriiduuna any yubaddiluu Kalaamallaah; qul lan tattabi'uunaa kazaalikum qaalal laahu min qablu fasa yaquuluuna bal tahsuduunanna; bal kaanuu laa yafqahuuna illaa qaliila

4599.verse: Qul lilmukhallafiina minal A'raabi satud'awna ilaa qawmin ulii baasin shadiidin tuqaati luunahum aw yuslimuuna fa in tutii'uu yu'tikumul laahu ajran hasananw wa in tatawallaw kamaa tawallaitum min qablu yu'azzibkum 'azaaban aliimaa

4600.verse: Laisa 'alal a'maa harajunw wa laa 'alal a'raji harajunw wa laa 'alal mariidi haraj' wa many yutil'il laaha wa Rasuulahuu yudkhilhu jannaatin tajrii min tahtihal anhaaru wa many yatawalla yu'azzibhu 'azaaban aliimaa

4601.verse: Laqad radiyal laahu 'anil mu'miniina iz yubaayi 'uunaka tahtash shajarati fa'alima maa fii quluubihim fa anzalas sakiinata 'alaihim wa asaa bahum fat han qariibaa

4602.verse: Wa maghaanima kasiira tany yaakhuzuunahaa; wa kaanal laahu 'Aziizan Hakiimaa

4603.verse: Wa'adakumul laahu ma ghaanima kasiiratan taakhuzuu nahaa fa'ajjala lakum haazihii wa kaffa aydiyan naasi 'ankum wa litakuuna aayatal lilmu'miniina wa yahdiyakum siraatam mustaqiima

4604.verse: Wa ukhraa lam taqdiruu 'alaihaa qad ahaatal laahu bihaa; wa kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'in qadiira

4605.verse: Wa law qaatalakumul laziina kafaruu la wallawul adbaara summa laa yajiduuna waliyanw-wa laa nasiiraa

4606.verse: Sunnatal laahil latii qad khalat min qablu wa lan tajida lisunnatil laahi tabdiilaa

4607.verse: Wa Huwal lazii kaffa aydiyahum 'ankum wa aydiyakum 'anhum bibatni Makkata mim ba'di an azfarakum 'alaihim; wa kaanal laahu bimaa ta'maluuna Basiira

4608.verse: Humul laziina kafaruu wa sadduukum 'anil-Masjidil-Haraami walhadya ma'kuufan any yablugha mahillah; wa law laa rijaalum mu'minuuna wa nisaaa'um mu'minaatul lam ta'lamuuhum an tata'uuhum fatusiibakum minhum ma'arratum bighairi 'ilmin liyud khilal laahu fii rahmatihii many yashaaa'; law tazayyaluu la'azzabnal laziina kafaruu minhum 'azaaban aliima

4609.verse: Iz ja'alal laziina kafaruu fii quluubihimul hamiyyata hamiyyatal jaahiliyyati fa anzalal laahu sakiinatahuu 'alaa Rasuulihii wa 'alal mu miniina wa alzamahum kalimatat taqwaa wa kaanuuu ahaqqa bihaa wa ahlahaa; wa kaanal laahu bikulli shai'in Aliima

4610.verse: Laqad sadaqal laahu Rasuulahur ru'yaa bilhaqq, latadkhulunnal Masjidal-Haraama in shaaa'al laahu aaminiina muhalliqiina ru'uusakum wa muqassiriina laa takhaafuuna fa'alima maa lam ta'lamuu faja'ala min duuni zaalika fathan qariibaa

4611.verse: Huwal laziie arsala Rasuulahuu bilhudaa wa diinil haqqi liyuzhirahuu 'alad diini kullih; wa kafaa billaahi Shahiida

4612.verse: Muhammadur Rasuulul laah; wallaziina ma'ahuuu ashiddaaa'u 'alal kuffaaari ruhamaaa'u bainahum taraahum rukka'an sujjadany yabtaghuuna fadlam minal laahi wa ridwaanan siimaahum fii wujuuhihim min asaris sujuud; zaalika masaluhum fit tawraah; wa masaluhum fil Injiili kazar'in akhraja shat 'ahuu fa 'aazarahuu fastaghlaza fastawaa 'alaa suuqihii yu'jibuz zurraa'a liyaghiiza bihimul kuffaar; wa'adal laahul laziina aamanuu wa 'amilus saalihaati minhum maghfiratanw wa ajran 'aziimaa

4613.verse: Yaa ayyuhal laziina aamanuu la tuqaddimuu baina yada yil laahi wa Rasuulihii wattaqul laah; innal laaha samii'un 'Aliim

4614.verse: Yaa ayyuhal laziina aamanuu laa tarfa'uuu aswaatakum fawqa sawtin Nabiyi wa laa tajharuu lahuu bilqawli kajahri ba'dikum liba 'din an tahbata a 'maalukum wa antum laa tash'uruun

4615.verse: Innal laziina yaghud duuna aswaatahum 'inda Rasuulil laahi ulaaa'ikal laziinam tah anal laahu quluubahum littaqwaa; lahum maghfiratunw waajrun 'aziim

4616.verse: Innal laziina yunaaduu naka minw waraaa'il hujuraati aksaruhum laa ya'qiluun

4617.verse: Wa law annahum sabaruu hatta takhruja ilaihim lakaana khairal lahum; wallaahu Ghafuurur Rahiim

4618.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina aamanuu in jaaa'akum faasqum binaba in fatabaiyanuuu an tusiibuu qawmam bijahalatin fatusbihuu 'alaa maa fa'altum naadimiin

4619.verse: Wa'lamuuu anna fiikum Rasuulal laah; law yutii'ukum fii kasiirim minal amrila'anittum wa laakinnal laaha habbaba ilaikumul iimaana wa zaiyanahuu fii quluubikum wa karraha ilaikumul kufra walfusuuqa wal'isyaan; ulaaaika humur raashiduun

4620.verse: Fadlam minal laahi wa ni'mah; wallaahu 'Aliimun Hakiim

4621.verse: Wa in taaa'ifataani minal mu'miniinaq tataluu faaslihuu bainahumaa fa-im baghat ih daahumaa 'alal ukhraa faqaatilul latii tabhii hattaa tafiie'a ilaaa amril laah; fa-in faaa't fa aslihuu bainahumaa bil'adli wa aqsituu innal laaha yuhibbul muqsitiin

4622.verse: Innamal mu'minuuna ikhwatun fa aslihuu baina akhawaykum wattaqul laaha la'allakum tuhamuun

4623.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina aamanuu laa yaskhar qawmum min qawmin 'asaaa anyyakuunuu khairam minhum wa laa nisaaa'um min nisaaa'in 'Asaaa ay yakunna khairam minhunna wa laa talmizuuu bil alqaab; bi'sal ismul fusuuqu ba'dal iimaan; wa mal-lam yatub fa-ulaaa'ika humuz zaalimuun

4624.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina aamanuj tanibuu kasiiram minaz zanni inna ba'daz zanniismunw wa laa tajassasuu wa la yaghtab ba'dukum ba'daa; a yuhibbu ahadukum any yaakula lahma akhiihi maitan fakarih tumuuh; wattaqul laa; innal laaha tawwaabur Rahiim

4625.verse: Yaaa ayyuhan naasu innaa khalaqnaakum min zakarinw wa unsaa wa ja'alnaakum shu'uubanw wa qabaaa'ila lita'aarafuu inna akramakum 'indal laahi atqaakum innal laaha 'Aliimun khabiir

4626.verse: Qaalatil-A 'raabu aamannaa qul lam tu'minuu wa laakin quuluuu aslamnaa wa lamma yadkhulil iimaanu fii quluubikum wa in tutii'ul laaha wa Rasuulahuu laa yalitkum min a'maalikum shai'aa; innal laaha Ghafuurur Rahiim

4627.verse: Innamal muu'minuunal laziina aamanuu billaahi wa Rasuulihii summa lam yartaabuu wa jaahaduu biamwaalihim wa anfusihim fii sabiilil laah; ulaaaika humus saadiquun

4628.verse: Qul atu'allimuunal laaha bidiinikum wallaahu ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ard; wallaahu bikulli shai'in 'Aliim

4629.verse: Yamunnuuna 'alaika an aslamuu qul laa tamunnuu 'alaiya Islaamakum balillaahu yamunnu 'alaikum an hadaakum lil iimaani in kuntum saadiqiin

4630.verse: Innal laaha ya'lamu ghaibas samaawaati wal ard; wallaahu basiirum bimaa ta'maluun

4632.verse: Bal 'ajibuuu an jaa'ahum munzirum minhum faqaalal kaafiruuna haazaa shai'un 'ajiib

4633.verse: 'A-izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaaban zaalika raj'um ba'iid

4634.verse: Qad 'alimnaa maa tanqu-sul-ardu minhum wa 'indanaa Kitaabun Hafiiz

4635.verse: Bal kazzabuu bilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum fahum fiie amrim mariij

4636.verse: Afalam yanzuruuu ilas samaaa'i fawqahum kaifa banainaahaa wa zaiyannaahaa wa maa lahaa min furuuj

4637.verse: Wal arda madadnaahaa wa alqainaa fiihaa rawaasiya wa ambatnaa fiihaa min kulli zawjim bahiij

4639.verse: Wa nazzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'am mubaarakan fa ambatnaa bihii jannaatinw wa habbal hasiid

4641.verse: Rizqal lil'ibaad, wa ahyainaa bihii baldatam maitaa; kazaalikal khuruuj

4642.verse: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu nuuhinw wa Ashaabur Rassi wa Samuud

4644.verse: Wa Ashaabul Aykati wa qawmu Tubba'; kullun kazzabar Rusula fahaqqa wa'iid

4645.verse: Afa'a yiinaa bilkhalqil awwal; bal hum fii labsim min khalqin jadiid

4646.verse: Wa laqad khalaqnal insaana wa na'lamu maa tuwaswisu bihii nafsuhuu wa Nahnu aqrabu ilaihi min hablil wariid

4647.verse: 'Iz yatalaqqal mutalaqqi yaani 'anil yamiini wa 'anish shimaali qa'iid

4648.verse: Maa yalfizu min qawlin illaa ladaihi raqiibun 'atiid

4649.verse: Wa jaaa'at kullu nafsim ma'ahaa saaa'iqunw wa shahiid

4650.verse: Wa nufikha fis Suur; zaalika yawmul wa'iid

4651.verse: Wa jaaa'at kullu nafsim ma'ahaa saaa'iqunw wa shahiid

4652.verse: Laqad kunta fii ghaf latim min haazaa fakashafnaa 'anka ghitaaa'aka fabasarukal yawma hadiid

4653.verse: Wa qaala qariinuhuu haazaa maa ladaiya 'atiid

4656.verse: Allazii ja'ala ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fa alqiyaahu fil'azaabish shadiid

4657.verse: Qaala qariinuhuu Rabbanaa maaa atghaituhuu wa laakin kaana fii dalaahim ba'iid

4658.verse: Qaala laa takhtasimuu ladaayya wa qad qaddamtu ilaikum bilwa'iid

4659.verse: Maa yubaddalul qawlu ladaiya wa maaa ana bizal laamil lil'abiid

4660.verse: Yawma naquulu li'jahannama halim talaati wa taquulu hal mim maziid

4661.verse: Wa uzlifatil jannatu lil muttaqiina ghaira ba'iid

4662.verse: Haaza maa tuu'aduuna likulli awwaabin hafiiz

4663.verse: Man khashiyar Rahmaana bilghaibi wa jaaa'a biqalbim muniib

4665.verse: Lahum maa yashaaa'uuna fiihaa wa ladainaa maziid

4666.verse: Wa kam ahlaknaa qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu minhum batshan fanaqqabuu fil bilaad, hal mim mahiis

4667.verse: Inna fii zaalika lazikraa liman kaana lahuu qalbun aw alqas sam'a wa huwa shahiid

4668.verse: Wa laqad khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaa fii sittati ayyaamin wa maa massanaa mil lughuub

4669.verse: Fasbir 'alaa maa yaquuluuna wa sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuluu'ish shamsi wa qablal ghuruub

4670.verse: Wa minal laili fasabbih hu wa adbaaras sujuud

4671.verse: Wastami' yawma yunaa dil munaadi mim makaanin qariib

4672.verse: Yawma yasmauunas sai hata bilhaqq zaalika yawmul khuruuj

4673.verse: Innaa Nahnu nuhyii wa numiitu wa ilainal masiir

4674.verse: Yawma tashaqqaqul ardu 'anhum siraa'aa; zaalika hashrun 'alainaa yasiir

4675.verse: Nahnu a'lamu bimaa yaquuluuna wa maaa anta 'alihim bijabbaarin fazakkir bil quraani many yakhaafu wa'iid

4689.verse: Zuuquu fitnatakum haa zal lazii kuntum bihii tas ta'jiluun

4691.verse: Aakhiziina maaa aataahum Rabbuhum; innahum kaanuu qabla zaalika muhsiniin

4692.verse: kaanuu qaliilam minal laili maa yahja'uun

4694.verse: Wa fiie amwaalihim haqqul lissaaa'ili walmahruum

4697.verse: Wa fissamaaa'i rizqukum wa maa tuu'aduun

4698.verse: Fawa Rabbis samaaa'i wal ardi innahuu lahaqqum misla maa annakum tantiquun

4699.verse: Hal ataaka hadiisu daifi Ibraahiimal mukramiin

4700.verse: Iz dakhaluu 'alaihi faqaaluu salaaman qaala salaamun qawmum munkaruun

4701.verse: Faraagha ilaaa ahlihii fajaaa'a bi'ijlin samiin

4703.verse: Fa awjasa minhm khii fatan qaaluu laa takhaf wa bashsharuuhu bighulaamin 'aliim

4704.verse: Fa aqbalatim ra-atuhuu fii sarratin fasakkat wajhahaa wa qaalat 'ajuuzun 'aqiim

4705.verse: Qaaluu kazaaliki qaala Rabbuki innahuu huwal hakiimul 'aliim

4707.verse: Qaaluuu innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmim mujrimiin

4710.verse: Fa akhrajnaa man kaana fiihaa minal mu'miniin

4711.verse: Famaa wajadnaa fiihaa ghaira baitim minal muslimiin

4712.verse: Wa taraknaa fiihaaa aayatal lillaziina yakhaafuunal 'azaabal aliim

4713.verse: Wa fii muusaaa iz arsalnaahu ilaa Fir'wna bisultaa nim mubiin

4714.verse: Fatawalla biruknihii wa qaala saahirun aw majnuun

4715.verse: Fa akhaznaahu wa junuu dahuu fanabaznaahum fil yammi wa huwa muliim

4717.verse: Maa tazaru min shai'in atat 'alaihi illaa ja'alat hu karramiim

4718.verse: Wa fii Samuuda iz qiila lahum tamatta''uu hattaa hiin

4719.verse: Fa'ataw 'an amri Rabbihim fa akhazal humus saa'iqatu wa hum yanzuruun

4720.verse: Famas tataa'uu min qiyaaminw wa maa kaanuu muntasiriin

4721.verse: Wa qawma nuuhim min qablu innahum kaano qawman faasiqiin

4722.verse: Wassamaaa'a banainaa haa bi aydinw wa innaa lamuusi'uun

4724.verse: Wa min kulli shai'in khalaqnaa zawjaini la'allakum tazakkaruun

4725.verse: Fafirruuu ilal laahi innii lakum minhu naziirum mubiin

4726.verse: Wa laa taj'aluu ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara innii lakum minhu naziirum mubiin

4727.verse: Kazaalika maaa atal laziina min qablihim mir Rasuulin illaa qaaluu saahirun aw majnuun

4728.verse: Atawaasaw bih; bal hum qawmun taaghuun

4730.verse: Wa zakkir fa innaz zikraa tanfa'ul mu'miniin

4731.verse: Wa maa khalaqtul jinna wal insa illaa liya'buduun

4732.verse: Maaa uriidu minhum mir rizqinw wa maaa uriidu anyyut'imuun

4733.verse: Innal laaha Huwar Razzaaqu Zul Quwwatil Matiin

4734.verse: Fa inna lillaziina zalamuu zanuubam misla zanuubi ashaabihim falaa yasta'jiluun

4735.verse: Fawailul lillaziina kafaruu miny yawmihimul lazii yuu'aduun

4748.verse: Yawma yuda'-'uuna ilaa naari jahannama da'-'aa

4749.verse: Haazihin naarul latii kuntum bihaa tukazzibuun

4750.verse: Afasihrun haazaaaa am antum laa tubsiruun

4751.verse: Islawhaa fasbiruuu aw laa tasbiruu sawaaa'un 'alaikum innamaa tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maluun

4752.verse: Innal muttaqiina fii jannaatinw wa na'iim

4753.verse: Faakihiina bimaaa aataahum rabbuhum wa waqaahum rabbuhum 'azaabal jahiim

4754.verse: Kuluu washrabuu haniie 'am bimaa kuntum ta'maluun

4755.verse: Muttaki'iina 'alaa sururim masfuufatinw wa zawwaj naahum bihuurin 'iin

4756.verse: Wallaziina aamanuu wattaba'at hum zurriyyatuhum biiimaanin alhaqnaa bihim zurriyyatahum wa maaa alatnaahum min 'amalihim min shai'; kullum ri'im bimaa kasaba rahiin

4757.verse: Wa amdadnaahum bifaa kihatinw wa lahmim mimmaa yashtahuun

4758.verse: Yatanaaza'uuna fiihaa kaasal laa laghwun fiihaa wa laa taasiim

4759.verse: Wa yatuufu 'alaihim ghilmaanul lahum ka annahum lu'lu'um maknuun

4761.verse: Qaaluuu innaa kunnaa qablu fiie ahlinaa mushfiqiin

4763.verse: Innaa kunnaa min qablu nad'uuhu innahuu huwal barrur rahiim

4764.verse: Fazakkir famaaa anta bini'mati rabbika bikaahininw wa laa majnuun

4765.verse: Am yaquuluuna shaa'irun natarabbasu bihii raibal manuun

4766.verse: Qul tarabbasuu fa innii ma'akum minal mutarabbisiin

4767.verse: Am taamuruhum ahlaamuhum bihaazaaa am hum qawmun taaghuun

4768.verse: Am yaquuluuna taqawwalah; bal laa yu'minuun

4769.verse: Falyaatuu bihadiisim mislihiie in kaanuu saadiqiin

4770.verse: Am khuliquu min ghairi shai'in am humul khaaliquun

4771.verse: Am khalaqus samaawaati wal ard; bal laa yuuqinuun

4772.verse: Am'indahum khazaaa'inu rabbika am humul musaitiruun

4773.verse: Am lahum sullamuny yastami'uuna fiihi falyaati mustami'uhum bisultaanim mubiin

4774.verse: Am lahul banaatu wa lakumul banuun

4775.verse: Am tas'aluhum ajran fahum mim maghramim musqaluun

4777.verse: Am yuriiduuna kaidan fallaziina kafaruu humul makiiduun

4778.verse: Am lahum ilaahun ghairul laa; subhaanal laahi 'ammaa yushrikuun

4779.verse: Wa iny yaraw kisfam minas samaaa'i saaqitany yaquuluu sahaabum markuum

4780.verse: Fazarhum hatta yulaaquu yawmahumul lazii fiihi yus'aquun

4781.verse: Yawma laa yughnii 'anhum kaidumhum shai'anw wa laa hum yunsaruun

4782.verse: Wa inna lillaziina zalamuu 'azaaban duuna zalika wa laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamuun

4783.verse: Wasbir lihukmi rabbika fa innaka bi-a'yuninaa wa sabbih bihamdi rabbika hiina taquum

4784.verse: Wa minal laili fasabbihhu wa idbaaran nujuum

4786.verse: Maa dalla saahibukum wa maa ghawaa

4795.verse: Maa kazabal fu'aadu maa ra aa

4797.verse: Wa laqad ra aahu nazlatan ukhraa

4801.verse: Maa zaaghal basaru wa maa taghaa

4802.verse: Laqad ra aa min aayaati Rabbihil kubraaa

4807.verse: In hiya illaaa asmaaa'un sammaitumuuhaaa antum wa aabaaa'ukum maaa anzalal laahu bihaa min sultaan; inyyattabi'uuna illaz zanna wa maa tahwal anfusu wa laqad jaaa'ahum mir Rabbihimul hudaa

4808.verse: Am lil insaani maa taman naa

4810.verse: Wa kam mim malakin fissamaawaati laa tughnii shafaa'atuhum shai'an illaa mim ba'di anyyaazanal laahu limany yashaaa'u wa yardaa

4811.verse: innal laziina laa yu'minuuna bil aakhirati la yusammuunal malaaa'ikata tasmiyatal unsaa

4812.verse: Wa maa lahum bihii min 'ilmin iny yattabi'uuna illaz zanna wa innaz zanna laa yughnii minal haqqi shai'aa

4813.verse: Fa a'rid 'am man tawallaa 'an zikrinaa wa lam yurid illal hayaatad dunyaa

4814.verse: Zalika mablaghuhum minal 'ilm; inna rabbaka huwa a'lamu biman dalla 'an sabii lihii wa huwa a'lamu bimanih tadaa

4815.verse: Wa lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi liyajziyal laziina asaaa'uu bimaa 'amiluu wa yajziyal laziina ahsanuu bilhusnaa

4816.verse: Allaziina yajtanibuuna kabaaa'iral ismi walfawaa hisha illal lamam; inna rabbaka waasi'ul maghfirah; huwa a'lamu bikum iz ansha akum minal ardi wa iz antum ajinnatun fii butuuni umma haatikum falaa tuzakkuuu anfusakum huwa a'lamu bimanit taqaa

4820.verse: Am lam yunabbaa bimaa fii suhuhfi muusa

4823.verse: Wa al laisa lil insaani illaa maa sa'aa

4827.verse: Wa annahuu huwa adhaka wa abkaa

4828.verse: Wa annahuu huwa amaata wa ahyaa

4829.verse: Wa annahuu khalaqaz zawjainiz zakara wal unsaa

4832.verse: Wa annahuu huwa aghnaa wa aqnaa

4836.verse: Wa qawma nuuhim min qablu innahum kaanuu hum azlama wa atghaa

4842.verse: Laisa lahaa min duunil laahi kaashifah

4848.verse: Wa iny yaraw aayatany yu'riduu wa yaquuluu sihrum mustamirr

4849.verse: Wa kazzabuu wattaba'uuu ahwaaa'ahum; wa kullu amrim mustaqirr

4850.verse: Wa laqad jaaa'ahum minal ambaaa'i maa fiihi muzdajar

4852.verse: Fatawalla 'anhum; yawma yad'ud daa'i ilaa shai 'in nukur

4853.verse: khushsha'an absaaruhum yakrujuuna minal ajdaasi ka annahum jaraadum muntashir

4854.verse: Muhti'iina ilad daa'i yaquulul kafiruuna haazaa yawmun 'asir

4855.verse: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu nuuhin fakazzabuu 'abdanaa wa qaaluu majnuu nunw wazdujir

4857.verse: Fafatahnaaa abwaabas sa maaa'i bimaa'im munhamir

4858.verse: Wa fajjamal arda 'uyuunan faltaqal maaa'u 'alaaa amrin qad qudir

4859.verse: Wa hamalnaahu 'alaa zaati alwaahinw wa dusur

4860.verse: Tajrii bi a'yuninaa jazaaa 'al liman kaana kufir

4861.verse: Wa laqat taraknaahaad aayatan fahal mim muddakir

4863.verse: Wa laqad yassamal Quraana liz zikri fahal mimmuddakir

4865.verse: Innaa arsalnaa 'alaihim riihan sarsaran fii Yawmi nahsim mustamirr

4866.verse: Tanzi;un naasa ka anna huma'jaazu nakhlim munqa'ir

4868.verse: Wa laqad yassamal Quraana liz zikri fahal mim muddakir

4870.verse: Faqaaluuu a-basharam minnaa waahidan nattabi'uhuuu innaa izal lafii dalaalinw wa su'ur

4871.verse: 'A-ulqiyaz zikru 'alaihi mim baininaa bal huwa kazzaabun ashir

4873.verse: Innaa mursilun naaqati fitnatal lahum fartaqibhum wastabir

4874.verse: Wa nabbi'hum annal maaa'a qismatum bainahum kullu shirbim muhtadar

4877.verse: Innaaa arsalnaa 'alaihim saihatanw waahidatan fakaano kahashiimil muhtazir

4878.verse: Wa laqad yassarnal quraana liz zikri fahal mim muddakir

4880.verse: Innaa arsalnaa 'alaihim haasiban illaaa aala luut najjainaahum bisahar

4881.verse: Ni'matam min 'indinaa; kazaalika najzii man shakar

4882.verse: Wa laqad anzarahum batshatanaa fatamaaraw binnuzur

4883.verse: Wa laqad raawaduuhu 'andaifii fatamasnaaa a'yunahum fazuuquu 'azaabii wa nuzur

4886.verse: Wa laqad yassarnal Quraana liz zikri fahal mim muddakir

4887.verse: Wa laqad jaaa'a Aala Fir'awnan nuzur

4888.verse: Kazzabuu bi Aayaatinaa kullihaa fa akhaznaahum akhza 'aziizim muqtadir

4889.verse: Akuffaarukum khairum min ulaaa'ikum am lakum baraaa'atun fiz Zubur

4891.verse: Sa yuhzamul jam'u wa yuwalluunad dubur

4892.verse: Balis Saa'atu maw'iduhum was Saa'atu adhaa wa amarr

4893.verse: Innal mujrimiina fii dalaalinw wa su'ur

4894.verse: Yawma yushabuuna fin Naari'alaa wujuuhimim zuuquu massa saqar

4896.verse: Wa maaa amrunaaa illaa waahidatun kalamhim bilbasar

4897.verse: Wa laqad ahlaknaaa ashyaa'akum fahal mim muddakir

4898.verse: Wa kullu shai'in fa'aluuhu fiz Zubur

4899.verse: Wa kullu saghiirinw wa kabiirim mustatar

4900.verse: Innal muttaqiina fii jannaatinw wa nahar

4910.verse: Wa aqiimul wazna bilqisti wa laa tukhsirul miizaan

4912.verse: Fiihaa faakihatunw wan nakhlu zaatul akmaam

4916.verse: Wa khalaqal jaaan mim maarijim min naar

4923.verse: Yakhruju minhumal lu 'lu u wal marjaanu

4925.verse: Wa lahul jawaaril mun sha'aatu fil bahri kal a'laam

4928.verse: Wa yabqaa wajhu rabbika zul jalaali wal ikraam

4930.verse: Yas'aluhuu man fissamaawaati walard; kulla ywmin huwa fii shaan

4934.verse: Yaa ma'sharal jinni wal insi inis tata'tum an tanfuzuu min aqtaaris samaawaati wal ardi fanfuzuu; laa tanfuzuuna illaa bisultaan

4936.verse: Yursalu 'alaikumaa shuwaazum min naarifiw-wa nuhaasun falaa tantasiraan

4938.verse: Fa-izan shaqqatis samaaa'u fakaanat wardatan kaddihaan

4940.verse: Fa-yawma'izil laa yus'alu 'an zambihiie insunw wa laa jaann

4942.verse: Yu'raful mujrimuuna bisiimaahum fa'yu'khazu binna waasi wal aqdaam

4944.verse: Haazihii jahannamul latii yukazzibu bihal mujrimuun

4945.verse: Yatuufuuna bainahaa wa baina hamiimim aan

4947.verse: Wa liman khaafa maqaama rabbihii jannataan

4955.verse: Muttaki'iina 'alaa furushim bataaa'inuhaa min istabraq; wajanal jannataini daan

4957.verse: Fiihinna qaasiratut tarfi lam yatmishunna insun qablahum wa laa jaaann

4969.verse: Fiihimaa faakihatunw wa nakhlunw wa rummaan

4975.verse: Lam yatmis hunna insun qablahum wa laa jaaann

4987.verse: Fa as haabul maimanati maaa as haabul maimanah

4988.verse: Wa as haabul mash'amati maaa as haabul mash'amah

4997.verse: Bi akwaabinw wa abaariiq, wa kaasim mim ma'iin

5004.verse: Laa yasma'uuna fiihaa laghwanw wa laa taasiimaa

5006.verse: Wa as haabul yamiini maaa as haabul Yamiin

5020.verse: Wa as haabush shimaali maaa as haabush shimaal

5026.verse: Wa kaanuu yaquuluuna a'izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaabanw wa izaaman'ainnaa lamab'uusuun

5031.verse: La aakiluuna min shaja rim min zaqquum

5039.verse: Nahnu qaddarnaa baina kumul mawta wa maa nahnu bimasbuuqiin

5040.verse: 'Alaaa an nubaddila amsaalakum wa nunshi'akum fii maa laa ta'lamuun

5041.verse: Wa laqad 'alimtumun nash atal uulaa falaw laa tazakkaruun

5044.verse: Law nashaaa'u laja'al naahu hutaaman fazaltum tafakkahuun

5048.verse: 'A-antum anzaltumuuhu minal muzni am nahnul munziluun

5049.verse: Law nashaaa'u ja'alnaahu ujaajan falaw laa tashkuruun

5052.verse: Nahnu ja'alnaahaa tazkira tanw wa mataa'al lilmuqwiin

5064.verse: Wa nahnu aqrabu ilaihi minkum wa laakil laa tubsiruun

5065.verse: Falaw laaa in kuntum ghira madiiniin

5067.verse: Fa ammaaa in kaana minal muqarrabiin

5068.verse: Farawhunw wa raihaa nunw wa jannatu na'iim

5069.verse: Wa ammaaa in kaana min as haabil yamiin

5070.verse: Fasalaamul laka min as haabil yamiin

5071.verse: Wa ammaaa in kaana minal mukazzibiinad daaalliin

5076.verse: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fissamaawaati wal ardi wa Huwal 'Aziizul Hakiim

5077.verse: Lahuu mulkus samaawaati wal ardi yuhyii wa yumiitu wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadiir

5078.verse: Huwal Awwalu wal'Aakhiru waz Zaahiru wal Baatinu wa huwa bikulli shai'in Aliim

5079.verse: Huwal lazii khalaqas samaawaati wal arda fii sittati ayyaamin summas tawaa 'alal 'Arsh; ya'lamu maa yaliju filardi wa maa yakhruju minhaa wa maa yanzilu minas samaaa'i wa maa ya'ruju fiiha wa Huwa ma'akum ayna maa kuntum; wallaahu bimaa ta'maluuna Basiir

5080.verse: Lahuu mulkus samaawaati wal ard; wa ilal laahi turja'ul umuur

5081.verse: Yuulijul laila fin nahaari wa yuulijun nahaara fil lail; wa Huwa 'Aliimum bizaatis suduur

5082.verse: Aaaminuu billaahi wa Rasuulihii wa anfiquu mimmaa ja'alakum mustakh lafiina fiihi fallaziina aamanuu minkum wa anfaquu lahum ajrun kabiir

5083.verse: Wa maa lakum laa tu'minuuna billaahi war Rasuulu yad'uukum lituu'minuu bi Rabbikum wa qad akhaza miisaaqakum in kuntum mu'miniin

5084.verse: Huwal lazii yunazzilu 'alaa 'abdihiie Aayaatim baiyinaatil liyukhrijakum minaz zulumaati ilan nuur; wa innal laaha bikum la Ra'uufur Rahiim

5085.verse: Wa maa lakum allaa tunfiquu fii sabiilil laahi wa lillaahi miiraasus samaawaati wal-ard; laa yastawii minkum man anfaqa min qablil fat-hi wa qaatal; ulaaaika a'zamu darajatam minal laziina anfaquu mim ba'du wa qaataluu; wa kullanw wa'adallaahul husnaa; wallaahu bimaa ta'maluuna Khabiir

5086.verse: man zal lazii yuqridul laaha qardan hasanan fa yudaa'ifahuu lahuu wa lahuuu ajrun kariim

5087.verse: Yawma taral mu'miniina walmu'minaati yas'aa nuuruhum baina aydiihim wa biaymaanihim bushraakumul yawma jannaatun tajrii min tahtihal anhaaru khaalidiina fiiha; zaalika huwal fawzul 'aziim

5088.verse: Yawma yaquulul munaa fiquuna walmunaafiqaatu lillaziina aamanun zuruunaa naqtabis min nuurikum qiilarji'uu waraaa'akum faltamisuu nuuran faduriba bainahum bisuuril lahuu baab, baatinuhuu fiihir rahmatu wa zaahiruhuu min qibalihi-'azaab

5089.verse: Yunaaduunahum alam nakum ma'akum qaaluu balaa wa laakinnakum fatantum anfusakum wa tarabbastum wartabtum wa gharratkumul amaaniyyu hatta jaaa'a amrul laahi wa gharrakum billaahil gharuur

5090.verse: Fal Yawma laa yu'khazu minkum fidyatunw wa laa minal laziina kafaruu; maawaakumun Naaru hiya maw laakum wa bi'sal masiir

5091.verse: Alam yaani laillziina aamanuuu an takhsha'a quluu buhum lizikril laahi wa maa nazala minal haqqi wa laa yakuunuu kallaziina uutul Kitaaba min qablu fataala 'alaihimul amadu faqasat quluubuhum wa kasiirum minhum faasiquun

5092.verse: I'lamuuu annal laaha yuhyil arda ba'da mawtihaa; qad baiyannaa lakumul Aayaati la'allakum ta'qiluun

5093.verse: Innal mussaddiqiina wal mussaddiqaati wa aqradul laaha qardan hassanany yudaa'afu lahum wa lahum ajrun kariim

5094.verse: Wallaziina aamanuu billaahi wa Rusulihiie ulaaa'ika humus siddiiquuna wash shuhadaaa'u 'inda Rabbihim lahum ajruhum wa nuuruhum wallaziina kafaruu wa kazzabuu bi aayaatinaaa ulaaaika As haabul jahiim

5095.verse: I'lamuuu annamal hayaa tud dunyaa la'ibunw wa lahwunw wa ziinatunw wa takaasurun bainakum wa takaasurn fil amwaali wal awlaad, kamasali ghaisin a'jabal kuffaara nabaatuhuu summa yahiiju fataraahu musfaaran summa yakuunu hutaamaa; wa fil aakhirati 'azaabun shadiidunw wa magh firatum minal laahi wa ridwaan; wa mal haiyaa tuddun yaaa illaa mataa'ul ghuruur

5096.verse: Saabiquuu ilaa maghfiratim mir Rabbikum wa jannatin 'arduhaa ka-'ardis samaaa'i wal ardi u'iddat lillaziina aamanuu billaahi wa Rusulih; zaalika fadlul laahi yu'tiihi many yashaaa'; wal laahu zul fadlil 'aziim

5097.verse: Maaa asaaba mim musii batin fil ardi wa laa fiie anfusikum illaa fii kitaabim min qabli an nabra ahaa; innaa zaalika 'alal laahi yasiir

5098.verse: Likailaa taasaw 'alaa maa faatakum wa laa tafrahuu bimaaa aataakum; wallaahu laa yuhibbu kulla mukhtaalin fakhuur

5099.verse: Allaziiena yabkhaluuna wa yaamuruunan naasa bil bukhl; wa many yatawalla fa innal laaha Huwal Ghaniyyul Hamiid

5100.verse: Laqad arsalnaa Rusulanaa bilbaiyinaati wa anzalnaa ma'ahumul Kitaaba wal Miizaana liyaquuman naasu bilqist, wa anzalnal hadiida fiihi baasun shadiidunw wa manaafi'u linnaasi wa liya'lamal laahu many yansuruhuu wa Rusulahuu bilghaib; innal laaha Qawiyyn 'Aziiz

5101.verse: Wa laqad arsalnaa nuuhanw wa Ibraahiima wa ja'alnaa fii zurriyyatihiman nubuwwata wal Kitaaba faminhum muhtad; wa kasiirum minhum faasiquun

5102.verse: Summa qaffainaa 'alaa aasaarihim bi Rusulinaa wa qaffainaa be 'iisab ni Maryama wa aatainaahul Injiila wa ja'alnaa fii quluubil laziinat taba' uuhu raafatanw wa rahmatanw wa rahbaaniyyatanib tada' uuhaa maa katanaahaa 'alaihim illab tighaaa'a ridwaanil laahi famaa ra'awhaa haqqa ri'aayatihaa fa aatainal laziina aamanuu minhum ajrahum wa kasiirum minhum faasiquun

5103.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina aamaanut taqullaaha wa aaminuu bi Rasuulihii yu'tikum kiflaini mir rahmatihii wa yaj'al lakum nuuran tamshuuna bihii wa yaghfir lakum; wallaahu Ghafuurur Rahiim

5104.verse: Li'alla ya'lama Ahlul kitaabi allaa yaqdiruuna 'alaa shai'im min fadlil laahi wa annal fadla bi Yadil laahi u'tiihi many yashaaa'; wallaahu Zul fadilil 'aziim

5105.verse: Qad sami'al laahu qawlal latii tujaadiluka fii zawjihaa wa tashtakiie ilal laahi wallaahu yasma'u tahaawurakumaa; innal laaha samii'um basiir

5106.verse: Allaziina yuzaahiruuna minkum min nisaaa'ihim maa hunnaa ummahaatihim in ummahaatuhum illal laaa'ii waladnahum; wa innaahum la yaquuluuna munkaram minal qawli wa zuuraa; wa innal laaha la'afuwwun ghafuur

5107.verse: Wallaziina yuzaahiruuna min nisaaa'ihim summa ya'uuduuna limaa qaaluu fatabriiru raqabatim min qabli any-yatamaaassaa; zaalikum tuu'azuuna bih; wallaahu bimaa ta'maluuna khabiir

5108.verse: Famal lam yajid fa siyaamu shahraini mutataabi'ayni min qabli any-yatamaaassaa famal lam yastati' fa-it'aamu sittiina miskiina; zaalika litu'minuu billaahi wa rasuulih'wa tilka huduudul laah; wa lilkaafiriina 'azaabun aliim

5109.verse: Innal laziina yuhaaadduunal laaha wa Rasuulahuu kubituu kamaa kubital laziina min qablihim; wa qad anzalnaaa aayaatim baiyinaat; wa lilkaa firiina 'azaabum muhiin

5110.verse: Yawma yab'asuhumul laahu jamii'an fayunabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiluu; ahsaahul laahu wa nasuuh; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'in shahiid

5111.verse: Alam tara annal laaha ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi maa yakuunu min najwaa salaasatin illaa Huwa raabi'uhum wa laa khamsatin illaa huwa saadisuhum wa laaa adnaa min zaalika wa laaa aksara illaa huwa ma'ahum ayna, maa kaanuu summa yunabbi'uhum bimaa 'amiluu yawmal qiyaamah; innal laaha bikulli shai'in aliim

5112.verse: Alam tara ilal laziina nuhuu 'anin najwaa summa ya'uuduuna limaa nuhuu 'anhu wa yatanaajawna bil ismi wal'udwaani wa ma'siyatir rasuuli wa izaa jaaa'uuka haiyawka bimaa lam yuhai yika bihil laahu wa yaquuluuna fii anfusihim law laa yu'azzibunal laahu bimaa naquul; hasbuhum jahannnamu yaslawnahaa fabi'sal masiir

5113.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina aamanuu izaa tanaajaytum falaa tatanaajaw bil ismi wal 'udwaani wa ma'siyatir rasuuli wa tanaajaw bil birri wattaqwaa wattaqul laahal laziie ilaihi tuhsharuun

5114.verse: Innaman najwaa minash shaitaani liyahzunal laziina aamanuu wa laisa bidaaarrihim shai'an illaa bi-iznil laah; wa 'alal laahi falyatawakkalil mu'minuun

5115.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina aamanuu izaa qiila lakum tafassahuu fil majaalisi fafsahuu yafsahil laahu lakum wa izaa qiilan shuzuu fanshuzuu yarfa'il laahul laziina aamanuu minkum wallaziina uutul 'ilma darajaat; wallaahu bimaa ta'maluuna khabiir

5116.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina aamanuuu izaa naajitumur Rasuula faqaddimuu baina yadai najwaakum sadaqah; zaalika khairul lakum wa athar; fa il lam tajiduu fa innal laaha ghafuurur Rahiim

5117.verse: 'A-ashfaqtum an tuqaddimuu baina yadai najwaakum sadaqaat; fa-iz lam taf'aluu wa taabal laahu 'alaikum fa aqiimus Salaata wa aatuz Zakaata wa atii'ul laaha wa rasuulah; wallaahu khabiirum bimaa ta'maluun

5118.verse: Alam tara ilal laziina tawallaw qawman ghadibal laahu 'alaihim maa hum minkum wa laa minhum wa yahlifuuna 'alal kazibi wa hum ya'lamuun

5119.verse: A'addal laahu lahum 'azaaban shadiidan innahum saaa'a maa kaanuu ya'maluun

5120.verse: Ittakhazuuu aymaanahum junnatan fasadduu 'an sabiilil laahi falahum 'azaabum muhiin

5121.verse: Lan tughniya 'anhum amwaaluhum wa laaa awladuhum minal laahi shai'aa; ulaaa 'ika As haabun Naari hum fiihaa khaaliduun

5122.verse: Yawma yab'asuhumul laahujamii'an fa yahlifuuna lahuu kamaa yahlifuuna lakum wa yahsabuuna annahum 'alaa shai'; alaaa innahum humul kaazibuun

5123.verse: Istahwaza 'alaihimush shaitaanu fa ansaahum zikral laah; ulaaa'ika hizbush shaitaaan; alaaa innaa hizbash shaitaani humul khaasiruun

5124.verse: Innal laziina yuhaaadduunal laaha wa Rasuulahuuu ulaaa'ika fil azalliin

5125.verse: Katabal laahu la aghlibanna ana wa Rusulii; innal laaha qawiyyun 'Aziiz

5126.verse: Laa tajidu qawmany yu'minuuna billaahi wal yawmil aakhiri yuwaaadduuna man haaaddal laaha wa Rasuulahuu wa law kaanuuu aabaaa'ahum aw abnaaa'ahum aw ikhwaa nahum aw 'ashiiratahum; ulaaa'ika kataba fii quluubihi mul iimaana wa ayyadahum biruuhimminhu wa yudkhilu hum jannatin tajrii min tahtihal anhaaru khaalidiina fiihaa; radiyal laahu 'anhum wa raduu 'anh; ulaaa 'ika hizbul laah; alaaa inna hizbal laahi humul muflihuun

5127.verse: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fissamaawaati wa maa fil ardi wa Huwal 'Aziizul Hakiim

5128.verse: Huwal laziie akharajal laziina kafaruu min ahlil kitaabi min diyaarihim li awwalil Hashr; maa zanantum any yakhrujuu wa zannuuu annahum maa ni'atuhum husuunuhum minal laahi faataahumul laahu min haisu lam yahtasibuu wa qazafa fii quluubihimur ru'ba yukhribuuna bu yuutahum bi aydiihim wa aydil mu'miniina fa'tabiruu yaaa ulil absaar

5129.verse: Wa law laaa an katabal laahu 'alaihimul jalaaa'a la'azzabahum fid dunyaa wa lahum fil Aakhirati 'azaabun Naar

5130.verse: Zaalika bi annahum shaaqqul laaha wa Rasuulahuu wa many yushaaaqqil laaha fa innal laaha shadiidul-'iqaab

5131.verse: Maa qata'tum mil liinatin aw taraktumuuhaa qaaa'imatan'alaaa usuulihaa fabi iznil laahi wa liyukhziyal faasiqiin

5132.verse: Wa maaa afaaa'al laahu 'alaaa Rasuulihii minhum famaaa awjaftum 'alaihi min khailiinw wa laa rikaabinw wa laakinnal laaha yusallitu Rusulahuu 'alaa many yashaaa'; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadiir

5133.verse: Maaa afaaa'al laahu 'alaa Rasuulihii min ahlil quraa falillaahi wa lir Rasuuli wa lizil qurbaa wal yataamaa walmasaakiini wabnis sabiili kai laa yakuuna duulatam bainal aghniyaaa'i minkum; wa maaa aataakumur Rasuulu fakhuzuuhu wa maa nahaakum 'anhu fantahuu; wattaqul laaha innal laaha shadiidul-'iqaab

5134.verse: Lilfuqaraaa'il Muhaaji riinal laziina ukhrijuu min diyaarihim wa amwaalihim yabtaghuuna fadlam minal laahi wa ridwaananw wa yansuruunal laaha wa Rasuulah; ulaaa'ika humus saadiquun

5135.verse: Wallaziina tabawwa'ud daara wal iimaana min qablihim yuhibbuuna man haajara ilaihim wa laa yajiduuna fii suduurihim haajatam mimmaa uutuu wa yu'siruuna 'alaa anfusihim wa law kaana bihim khasaasah; wa many yuuqa shuhha nafsihii fa ulaaa'ika humul muflihuun

5136.verse: Wallaziina jaaa'uu min ba'dihim yaquuluuna Rabbanagh fir lanaa wa li ikhwaani nal laziina sabquunaa bil iimaani wa laa taj'al fii quluubinaa ghillalil laziina aamanuu rabbannaaa innaka Ra'uufur Rahiim

5137.verse: Alam tara ilal laziina naafaquu yaquuluuna li ikhwaanihimul laziina kafaruu min ahlil kitaabi la'in ukhrijtum lanakhrujanna ma'akum wa laa nutii'u fiikum ahadan abadanw-wa in quutiltum lanansuran nakum wallaahu yashhadu innahum lakaazibuun

5138.verse: La'in ukhrijuu laa yakhrujuuna ma'ahum wa la'in quutiluu laa yansuruunahum wa la'in nasaruuhum la yuwallunnal adbaara summa laa yunsaruun

5139.verse: La antum ashaddu rahbatan fii suduurihim minal laah; zaalika bi annahum qawmul laa yafqahuun

5140.verse: Laa yuqaatiluunakum jamii'an illaa fii quram muhas sanatin aw minw waraaa'i judur; baasuhum bainahum shadiid; tahsabuhum jamii'anw-wa quluubuhum shatta; zaalika biannahum qawmul laa ya'qiluun

5141.verse: Kamasalil laziina min qablihim qariiban zaaquu wabaala amrihim wa lahum 'azaabun aliim

5142.verse: Kamasalish shaitaani izqaala lil insaanik fur falammaa kafara qaala innii bariie'um minka inniie akhaaful laaha rabbal 'aalamiin

5143.verse: Fakaana 'aaqibatahumaaa annahumaa fin naari khaalidaini fiihaa; wa zaalika jazaaa'uz zaalimiin

5144.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina aamanut taqul laa; waltanzur nafsum maa qaddamat lighadiw wattaqual laah; innal laaha khabiirum bimaa ta'maluun

5145.verse: Wa laa takuunuu kallaziina nasul laaha fa ansaahum anfusahum; ulaaa'ika humul faasiquun

5146.verse: Laa yastawiie as-haabun naari wa ashaabul jannah; as haabul jannati humul faaa'izuun

5147.verse: Law anzalnaa haazal quraana 'alaa jabilil lara aytahuu khaashi'am muta saddi'am min khashiyatil laah; wa tilkal amsaalu nadribuhaa linnaasi la'allahum yatafakkaruun

5148.verse: Huwal-laahul-lazii laaa Ilaaha illaa Huwa 'Aalimul Ghaibi wash-shahaada; Huwar Rahmaanur-Rahiim

5149.verse: Huwal-laahul-lazii laaa Ilaaha illaa Huwal-Malikul Qudduusus-Salaamul Muminul Muhaiminul-'aAziizul Jabbaarul-Mutakabbir; Subhaanal laahi 'Ammaa yushrikuun

5150.verse: Huwal Laahul Khaaliqul Baari 'ul Musawwir; lahul Asmaaa'ul Husnaa; yusabbihu lahuu maa fis samaawaati wal ardi wa Huwal 'Aziizul Hakiim

5151.verse: Yaa ayyuhal laziina aamanuu laa tattakhizuu 'aduwwii wa 'aduwaakum awliyaaa'a tulquuna ilaihim bilmawaddati wa qad kafaruu bima jaaa'akum minal haqq, yukhrijuunar Rasuula wa iyyaakum an tu'minuu billaahi rabbikum in kuntum kharajtum jihaadan fii sabiilii wabtighaaa'a mardaatii; tusirruuna ilaihim bilma waddati wa ana a'alamu bimaaa akhfaitum wa maaa a'lantum; wa many yaf'alhu minkum faqad dalla sawaaa'as sabiil

5152.verse: Iny yasqafuukum yakuunuu lakum a'daaa'anw wa yabsutuuu ilaikum aydiyahum wa alsinatahum bissuuu'i wa wadduu law takfuruun

5153.verse: Lan tanfa'akum arhaamukum wa laaa awlaadukum; yawmal qiyaamati yafsilu bainakum; wallaahu bimaa ta'maluun basiir

5154.verse: Qad kaanat lakum uswatun basanatun fiie Ibraahiima wallaziina ma'ahuu iz qaaluu liqawmihim innaa bura'aaa'u minkum wa mimmaa ta'buduuna min duunil laahi kafarnaa bikum wa badaa bainanaa wa bainakumul 'adaawatu wal baghdaaa'u abadan hattaa tu'minuu billaahi wahdahuuu illaa qawla Ibrahiima li abiihi la astaghfiranna laka wa maaa amliku laka minal laahi min shai; rabbanaa 'alaika tawakkalnaa wa ilaika anabnaa wa ilaikal masiir

5155.verse: Rabbana laa taj'alnaa fitnatal lillaziina kafaruu waghfir lanaa rabbanaa innaka antal aziizul hakiim

5156.verse: Laqad kaana lakum fiihim uswatunhasanatul liman kaana yarjul laaha wal yawmal aakhir; wa many yatawalla fa innal laaha huwal ghaniyyul hamiid

5157.verse: Asal laahu any yaj'ala bainakum wa bainal laziina 'aadaitum minhum mawaddah; wallahu qadiir; wallahu ghafuurur rahiim

5158.verse: Laa yanhaakumul laahu 'anil laziina lam yuqaatiluukum fid diini wa lam yukhrijuukum min diyaarikum an tabarruuhum wa tuqsituuu ilaihim; innal laaha yuhibbul muqsitiin

5159.verse: Innamaa yanhaakumul laahu 'anil laziina qaataluukum fid diini wa akhrajuukum min diyaarikum wa zaaharuu 'alaa ikhraajikum an tawallawhum; wa many yatawallahum faulaaa'ika humuz zaalimuun

5160.verse: Yaa ayyuhal laziina aamanuu izaa jaaa'akumul mu'minaatu muhaajiraatin famtah inuuhunna Allaahu a'lamu biiimaanihinna fa in 'alimtumuuhunna mu'minaatin falaa tarji'uuhunna ilal kuffaar; laa hunna hillul lahum wa laa hum uahilluuna lahunna wa aatuuhum maa anfaquu wa laa junaaha 'alaikum an tankihuuhunna izaaa aataitumuuhunna ujuurahunn; wa laa tumsikuu bi 'isamil kawaafiri was'aluu maaa anfaqtum walyas'aluu maaa anfaquu zaalikum hukmul laahi yahkumu bainakum wallaahu 'aliimun hakiim

5161.verse: Wa in faatakum shai'um min azwaajikum ilal kuffaari fa'aaqabtum fa aatul laziina zahabat azwaajuhum misla maaa anfaquu; wattaqul laahal laziie antum bihii mu'minuun

5162.verse: Yaaa ayyuhan nabbiyyu izaa jaaa'akal mu'minaau yubaai naka 'alaaa allaa yushrikna billaahi shai 'anw wa laa yasriqna wa laa yazniina wa laa yaqtulna awlaadahunna wa laa yaatiina bibuhtaaniny yaftarii nahuu baina aydiihinna wa arjulihinna wa laa ya'siinaka fii ma'ruufin fabaayi'hunna wastaghfir lahunnal laaha innnal laaha ghafuurur rahiim

5163.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina amanuu laa tatawallaw qawman ghadibal laahu 'alaihim qad ya'isuu minal aakhirati kamaa ya'isal kuffaaru min as haabil qubuur

5164.verse: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fisamaawaati wa maa fil ardi wa huwal 'Aziizul Hakiim

5165.verse: Yaa ayyuhal laziina aamanuu lima taquuluuna maa laa taf'aluun

5166.verse: Kabura maqtan 'indal laahi an taquuluu maa laa taf'aluun

5167.verse: Innal laaha yuhibbul laziina yuqaatiluuna fii sabiilihii saffan kaannahum bunyaanum marsuus

5168.verse: Wa iz qaala muusa liqawmihii yaa qawmi lima tu'zuunanii wa qat ta'lamuuna annii Rasuulul laahi ilaikum falammaa zaaghuuu azaaghal laahu quluubahum; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmal faasiqiin

5169.verse: Wa iz qaala 'iisab-nu-Mayama yaa Banii Israaa'iila innii Rasuulul laahi ilaikum musaddiqal limaa baina yadayya minat Tawraati wa mubashshiram bi Rasuuliny yaatii mim ba'dis muhuuu Ahmad; falammaa jaaa'ahum bil baiyinaati qaaluu haazaa sihrum mubiin

5170.verse: Wa man azlamu mimma nif taraa 'alal laahil kaziba wa huwa yad'aaa ilal Islaam; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimiin

5171.verse: Yuriiduuna liyutfi'uu nuural laahi bi afwaahimim wallaahu mutimmu nuurihii wa law karihal kaafiruun

5172.verse: Huwal lazii arsala Rasuulahuu bilhudaa wa diinil haqqi liyuzhirahuu 'alad diini kullihii wa law karihal mushrikuun

5173.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina aammano hal adullukum 'alaa tijaaratin tunjiikum min 'azaabin aliim

5174.verse: Tu'minuuna billaahi wa Rasuulihii wa tujaahiduuna fii sabiilil laahi bi amwaalikum wa anfusikum; zaalikum khairul lakum in kuntum ta'lamuun

5175.verse: Yaghfir lakum zunuubakum wa yudkhilkum Jannaatin tajrii min tahtihal anhaaru wa masaakina taiyibatan fii Jannaati 'Ad; zaalikal fawzul 'Aziim

5176.verse: Wa ukhraa tuhibbuunahaa nasrum minal laahi wa fat hun qarii; wa bashshiril mu 'miniin

5177.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina aamaanuu kuunuuu ansaaral laahi kamaa qaala 'iisab-nu-Maryama lil Hawaariyyiina man ansaariie ilal laah; qaalal Hawaariyyuuna nahnu ansaa rul laahi fa aamanat taaa'ifatum mim Bannii Israaa'iila wa kafarat taaa'ifatun fa ayyadnal laziina aammanuu 'alaa 'aduwwihim fa asbahuu zaahiriin

5178.verse: Yusabbihu lilaahi maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardil Malikil Qudduusil 'Aziizil Hakiim

5179.verse: Huwal lazii ba'asa fil ummiyyiina Rasuulam min hum yatluu 'alaihim aayaatihii wa yuzakkiihim wa yu'allimuhumul Kitaaba wal Hikmata wa in kaano min qablu lafii dalaalim mubiin

5180.verse: Wa aakhariina minhum lammaa yalhaquu bihim wa huwal 'aziizul hakiim

5181.verse: Zaalika fadlul laahi yu'tiihi many-yashaaa; wallaahu zul fadil 'aziim

5182.verse: Masalul laziina hum milut tawraata summa lam yahmiluunhaa kamasalil himaari yah milu asfaaraa; bi'sa masalul qawmil laziina kaazzabuu bi aayaatil laah; wallaahu laa yahdil qawmazzaalimiin

5183.verse: Qul yaaa ayyuhal laziina haaduu in za'amtum annakum awliyaaa'u lilaahi min duunin naasi fatamannawul mawta in kuntum saadiqiin

5184.verse: Wa laa yatamannaw nahuuu abadam bimaa qaddamat aydiihim; wallaahu 'aliimum bix zaalimiin

5185.verse: Qul innal mawtal lazii tafirruuna minhu fa innahuu mulaaqiikum summa turadduuna ilaa 'Aalimil Ghaibi wash shahaadati fa yunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maluun

5186.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina aamanuu izaa nuudiya lis-Salaati miny yawmil Jumu'ati fas'aw ilaa zikril laahi wa zarul bai'; zaalikum khayrul lakum in kuntum ta'lamuun

5187.verse: Fa-izaa qudiyatis Salaatu fantashiruu fil ardi wabtaghuu min fadlil laahi wazkurul laaha kasiiral la'allakum tuflihuun

5188.verse: Wa izaa ra'aw tijaaratan aw lahwanin fadduuu ilaihaa wa tarakuuka qaaa'imaa; qul maa 'indal laahi khairum minal lahwi wa minat tijaarah; wallaahu khayrur raaziqiin

5189.verse: Izaa jaaa'akal munaafiquuna qaaluu nashhadu innaka la rasuulul laah; wallaahu ya'lamu innaka la rasuuluhuu wallaahu yashhadu innal munaafiqiina lakaazibuun

5190.verse: Ittakhazuu aymaanahum junnatan fasadduu 'an sabiilil laah; innahum saaa'a maa kaanuu ya'maluun

5191.verse: Zaalika bi annahum aamanuu summa kafaruu fatubi'a 'alaa quluubihim fahum laa yafqahuun

5192.verse: Wa izaa ra aytahum tu'jibuka ajsaamuhum wa iny yaquuluu tasma' liqawlihim kaannahum khushubum musannadah; yahsabuuna kulla saihatin 'alaihim; humul 'aduwwu fahzarhum; qaatalahumul laahu annaa yu'fakuun

5193.verse: Wa izaa qiila lahum ta'aalaw yastaghfir lakum rasuulul laahi lawwaw ru'uu sahum wa ra aytahum yasudduuna wa hum mustakbiruun

5194.verse: Sawaaa'un 'alaihim as taghfarta lahum am lam tastaghfir lahum lany yaghfiral laahu lahum; innal laaha laa yahdil qawmal faasiqiin

5195.verse: Humul laziina yaquuluuna laa tunfiquu 'alaa man inda Rasuulil laahi hatta yanfadduu; wa lillaahi khazaaa' inus samaawaati wal ardi wa laakinnal munaafiqiina la yafqahuun

5196.verse: Yaquuluuna la'ir raja'naaa ilal madiinati la yukhrijanal a'azzu minhal azall; wa lillaahil 'izzatu wa li Rasuulihii wa lilmu'miniina wa laakinnal munaafiqiina laa ya'lamuun

5197.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina aamanuu la tulhikum amwaalukum wa laa awlaadukum 'anzikril laah; wa mai-yaf'al zaalika fa-ulaaa'ika humul khaasiruun

5198.verse: Wa anifquu mim maa razaqnaakum min qabli any-yaatiya ahadakumul mawtu fa yaquula rabbi law laaa akhkhartaniie ilaaa ajalin qariibin fa assaddaqa wa akum minassaalihiin

5199.verse: Wa lany yu 'akhkhiral laahu nafsan izaa jaaa'a ajaluhaa; wallaahu khabiirum bimaa ta'maluun

5200.verse: Yusabbihu lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi lahul mulku wa lahul hamd, wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shai 'in Qadiir

5201.verse: Huwal lazii khalaqakum faminkum kaafirunw wa min kum mu'min ; wallaahu bimaa ta'maluuna Basiir

5202.verse: Khalaqas samaawaati wal arda bilhaqqi wa sawwarakum fa ahsana suwarakum wa ilaihil masiir

5203.verse: Ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wal ardi wa ya'lamu maa tusirruuna wa maa tu'linuun; wallaahu 'Aliimum bizaatis suduur

5204.verse: Alam yaatikum naba'ul laziina kafaruu min qablu fazaaquu wabaala amrihim wa lahum 'azaabun aliim

5205.verse: Zaalika bi annahuu kaanat taatiihim Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati faqaaluu a basharuny yahduunanaa fakafaruu wa tawallaw; wastaghnal laah; wallaahu ghaniyyun hamiid

5206.verse: Za'amal laziina kafaruuu al-lany yub'asuu; qul balaa wa rabbii latub'asunna summa latunabba'unna bimaa 'amiltum; wa zaalika 'alal laahi yasiir

5207.verse: Fa-aaminuu billaahi wa rasuulihii wannuuril laziie anzalnaa; wallaahu bima ta'maluuna khabiir

5208.verse: Ywma yajma'ukum li yawmil jam'i zaalika yawmut taghaabun; wa many-yumim billaahi wa ya'mal saalihany yukaffir 'anhu sayyi aatihii wa yudkhilhu jannaatin tajrii min tahtihal anhaaru khaalidiina fiihaaa abadaa; zaalikal fawzul 'aziim

5209.verse: Wallaziina kafaruu wa kazzabuu bi aayaaatinaaa ulaaa'ika ashaabun naari khaalidiina fiihaa bi'sal masiir

5210.verse: Maaa asaaba mim musii batin illaa bi-iznil laah; wa many yu'mim billaahi yahdi qalbah; wallaahu bikulli shai;in Aliim

5211.verse: Wa atii'ul laaha wa atii'ur Rasuul; fa in tawallaitum fa innamaa 'alaa Rasuulinal balaaghul mubiin

5212.verse: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huu; wa 'alal laahi falyata wakkalil mu'minuun

5213.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina aamanuuu inna min azwaaji kum wa awlaadikum 'aduwwal lakum fahzaruuhum; wa in ta'fuu wa tasfahuu wa taghfiruu fa innal laaha ghafuurur Rahiim

5214.verse: Innamaa amwaalukum wa awlaadukum fitnah; wallaahu 'indahuuu ajrun 'aziim

5215.verse: Fattaqul laaha mastat'tum wasma'uu wa atii'uu waanfiquu khairal li anfusikum; wa many-yuuqa shuha nafsihii fa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihuun

5216.verse: In tuqridul laaha qardan hasanany yudd'ifhu lakum wa yaghfir lakum; wallaahu Shakuurun Haliim

5218.verse: Yaaa ayyuhan nabiyyu izaa tallaqtummun nisaaa'a fatalliquuhunna li'iddatihinna wa ahsul'iddata; wattaqul laaha rabbakum laa tukhri juuhunna mim bu-yuutihinna wa laa yakhrujna illaaa any yaatiima bifaahishatim mubaiyinah; wa tilka huduudul laah; wa many yata'adda huduudal laahi faqad zalama nafsha; laa tadrii la'allal laaha yuhdisu ba'dazaalika amraa

5219.verse: Fa izaa balaghna ajalahunna fa amsikuuhunna bima'ruufin aw faariquuhunna bima'ruufinw wa ashhiduu zawai 'adlim minkum wa aqiimush shahaadata lillaah; zaalikum yuu'azu bihii man kaana yu'minu billaahi wal yawmil aakhir; wa many yattaqil laaha yaj'al lahuu makhrajaa

5220.verse: Wa yarzuqhu min haisu laa yahtasib; wa many yatawakkal 'alal laahi fahuwa husbuh; innal laaha baalighu amrih; qad ja'alal laahu likulli shai'in qadraa

5221.verse: Wallaaa'ii ya'isna minal mahiidi min nisaaa 'ikum inir tabtum fa'iddatuhunna salaasatu ashhurinw wallaaa'ii lam yahidn; wa ulaatul ahmaali ajaluhunna any yada'na hamlahun; wa many yattaqil laaha yaj'al lahuu min armrihii yusraa

5222.verse: Zaalika amrul laahi anzalahuu ilaikum; wa many yattaqil laaha yukaffir 'anhu saiyi aatihii wa yu'zim lahuu ajraa

5223.verse: Askinuuhunna min haisu sakantum minw wujdikum wa laa tudaaarruuhunna litudaiyiquu 'alaihinn; wa in kunna ulaati hamlin fa anfiquu 'alihinna hattaa yada'na hamlahunn; fain arda'na lakum fa aatuu hunna ujuurahunna waatamiruu bainakum bima'ruufinw wa in ta'aasartum fasaturdi'u lahuuu ukhraa

5224.verse: Liyuntiq zuu sa'atim min sa'atihii wa man qudira 'alaihi riquhuu falyunfiq mimmaaa aataahul laah; laa yukalliful laahu nafsan illaa maaa aataahaa; sa yaj'alul laahu ba'da'usriny yusraa

5225.verse: Wa ka ayyim min qaryatin 'atat 'an amri Rabbihaa wa Rusulihii fahaasabnaahaa hisaaban shadiidanw wa 'azzabnaahaa 'azaaban nukraa

5226.verse: Fazaaqat wabbala amrihaa wa kaana 'aaqibatu amrihaa khusraa

5227.verse: A'addal laahu lahum 'azaaban shadiidan fattaqul laaha yaaa ulil albaab, allaziina aammanuu; qad anzalal laahu ilaikum zikraa

5228.verse: Rasuulany yatluu 'alaikum aayaatil laahi mubaiyinaatil liyukhrijal laziina aamanuu wa 'amilus saalihaati minaz zulumaati ilan nuur; wa many yu'mim billaahi wa ya;mal saalihany yudkhilhu jannaatin tajrii min tahtihal anhaaru khaalidiina fiihaa abadan qad ahsanal laahu lahuu rizqqq

5229.verse: Allaahul lazii khalaq Sab'a Samaawaatinw wa minal ardi mislahunna yatanazzalul amru bainahunna lita'lamuuu annal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadiirunw wa annal laaha qad ahaata bikulli shai'in ilmaa

5230.verse: Yaaa ayyuhan nabiyyu lima tuharrimu maaa ahallal laahu laka tabtaghii mardaata azwaajik; wallaahu ghafuurur rahiim

5231.verse: Qad faradal laahu lakum tahillata aymaanikum; wallaahu mawlaakum wa huwal'aliimul hakiim

5232.verse: Wa iz asarran nabiyyu ilaa ba'di azwaajihii hadiisan falammaa nabba at bihii wa azharahul laahu 'alaihi 'arrafa ba'dahuu wa a'rada 'am ba'din falammaa nabba ahaa bihii qaalat man amba aka haaza qaala nabba aniyal 'aliimul khabiir

5233.verse: In tatuubaaa ilal laahi faqad saghat quluubukumaa wa in tazaaharaa 'alihi fa innal laaha huwa mawlaahu wa jibriilu wa saalihul mu'miniin; walma laaa'ikatu ba'dazaalika zahiir

5234.verse: 'Asaa rabbuhuuu in tallaqakunna anyyubdilahuuu azwaajan khairam mnkunna muslimaatim mu'minaatin qaanitaatin taaa'ibaatin 'aabidaatin saaa'ihaatin saiyibaatinw wa abkaaraa

5235.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina samanuu quuu anfusakum wa ahliikum naaranw waquudu han naasu wal hijaaratu 'alaihaa malaaa'ikatun ghilaazun shidaadul laa ya'suunal laaha maa amarahum wa yaf'aluuna maa yu'maruun

5236.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina kafaruu la ta'tazinul yawma innamaa tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maluun

5237.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal laziina aammano tuubuuu ilal laahi tawbatan nasuuhan 'asaa rabbukum any-yukaffira 'ankum sayyi aatikum wa yudkhilakum jannaatin tajrii min tahtihal anhaaru yawma laa yukhzil laahun nabiyya wallaziina aamanuu ma'ahuu nuuruhum yas'aa baina aydiihim wa bi aymaanihim yaquuluuna rabbanaaa atmim lanaa nuuranaa waghfir lana innaka 'alaa kulli shai'in qadiir

5238.verse: yaaa ayyuuhan nabiyyu jaahidil kuffaara walmunaa-fiqiina waghluz 'alaihim; wa maawaahum jahannamu wa bi'sal masiir

5239.verse: Darabal laahu masalal lillaziina kafarum ra ata nuubinw wamra ata luut, kaanataa tahta 'abdaini min 'ibaadinaa saalihaini fakhaanataahumaa falam yughniyaa 'anhumaa minal laahi shai anw-wa qiilad khulan naara ma'ad Daakhiliin

5240.verse: Wa darabal laahu masa lal-lillaziina aamanumra ata Fir'awn; iz qaalat rabbibni lii 'indaka baitan fil jannati wa najjinii min Fir'awna wa 'amalihii wa najjinii minal qawmiz zaalimiin

5241.verse: Wa Maryamab nata 'Imraanal latiie ahsanat farjahaa fanafakhnaa fiihi mir ruubinaa wa saddaqat bikali maati Rabbihaa wa Kutubihii wakaanat minal qaanitiin

5242.verse: Tabaarakal lazii biyadihil mulku wa huwa 'alaa kulli shai-in qadiir

5243.verse: Allazii khalaqal mawta walhayaata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu 'amalaa; wa huwal 'aziizul ghafuur

5244.verse: Allazii khalaqa sab'a samaawaatin tibaaqam maa taraa fii khalqir rahmaani min tafaawutin farji'il basara hal taraa min futuur

5245.verse: Summar ji'il basara karrataini yanqalib ilaikal basaru khaasi'anw wa huwa hasiir

5246.verse: Wa laqad zaiyannas samaaa'ad dunyaa bimasaa biiha wa ja'alnaahaa rujuumal lish shayaatiini wa a'tadnaa lahum 'azaabas sa'iir

5247.verse: Wa lillaziina kafaruu bi rabbihim 'azaabu jahannama wa bi'sal masiir

5248.verse: Izaaa ulquu fiihaa sami'uu lahaa shahiiqanw wa hiya tafuur

5249.verse: Takaadu tamayyazu minal ghaizi kullamaaa uliqya fiihaa fawjun sa alahum khazanatuhaaa alam yaatikum naziir

5250.verse: Qaaluu balaa qad jaaa'anaa naziirun fakazzabnaa wa qulnaa maa nazzalal laahu min shai in in antum illaa fii dalaalin kabiir

5251.verse: Wa qaaluu law kunnaa nasma'u awna'qilu maa kunnaa fiie as haabis sa'iir

5252.verse: Fa'tarafuu bizambihim fasuhqal li as haabis sa'iir

5253.verse: Innal laziina yakhshawna rabbahum bilghaibi lahum maghfiratunw wa ajrun kabiir

5254.verse: Wa asirruu qawlakum awijharuu bihii innahuu 'aliimum bizaatis suduur

5255.verse: Alaa ya'lamu man khalaq wa huwal latiiful khabiir

5256.verse: Huwal lazii ja'ala lakumul arda zaluulan famshuu fii manaakibihaa wa kuluu mir rizqihii wa ilaihin nushuur

5257.verse: 'A-amintum man fissamaaa'i aiyakhsifa bi kumul arda fa izaa hiya tamuur

5258.verse: Am amintum man fissamaaa'i ai yursila 'alaikum haasiban fasata'lamuuna kaifa naziir

5259.verse: Wa laqad kazzabal laziina min qablihim fakaifa kaana nakiir

5260.verse: Awalam yaraw ilat tairi fawqahum saaaffaatinw wa yaqbidn; maa yumsikuhunna illaar rahmaan; innahuu bikulli shai im basiir

5261.verse: Amman haazal lazii huwa jundul lakum yansurukum min duunir rahmaan; inilkaafiruuna illaa fii ghuruur

5262.verse: Amman haazal lazii yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqah; bal lajjuu fii 'utuwwinw wa nufuur

5263.verse: Afamai yamshii mukibban 'alaa wajhihii ahdaaa ammany yamshii sawiyyan 'alaa siratim mustaqiim

5264.verse: Qul huwal lazii ansha akum wa ja'ala lakumus sam'a wal absaara wal af'idata qaliilam maa tashkuruun

5265.verse: Qul huwal lazii zara akum fil ardi wa ilaihi tuhsharuun

5266.verse: Wa yaquuluuna mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqiin

5267.verse: Qul innamal 'ilmu 'indallaahi wa innamaaa ana naziirum mubiin

5268.verse: Falaammaa ra-awhu zulfatan siie'at wujuuhul laziina kafaruu wa qiila haazal lazii kuntum bihii tadda'uun

5269.verse: Qul ara'aytum in ahlaka niyal laahu wa mam ma'iya aw rahimanaa famai-yujiirul kaafiriina min 'azaabin aliim

5270.verse: Qul huwar rahmaanu aamannaa bihii wa 'alaihi tawakkalnaa fasata'lamuuna man huwa fii dalaalim mubiin

5271.verse: Qul ara'aytum in asbaha maaa'ukum ghawran famai yaatiikum bimaaa'im ma'iin

5274.verse: Wa inna laka la ajran ghaira mamnuun

5278.verse: Innaa Rabbaka Huwa a'lamu biman dalla 'an sabiilihii wa Huwa a'lamu bilmuhtadiin

5281.verse: Wa laa tuti' kulla hallaa fim mahiin

5286.verse: Izaa tutlaa 'alaihi aayaatunaa qaala asaatiirul awwaliin

5288.verse: Innaa balawnaahum kamaa balawnaaa As-haabal jannati iz 'aqsamuu la-yasri munnahaa musbihiin

5290.verse: Fataafa 'alaihaa taaa'i fum mir rabbika wa hum naaa'imuun

5297.verse: Falammaa ra awhaa qaaluuu innaa ladaaalluun

5299.verse: Qaala awsatuhum alam aqul lakum law laa tusabbihuun

5300.verse: Qaaluu subhaana rabbinaaa innaa kunnaa zaalimiin

5302.verse: Qaaluu yaa wailanaaa innaa kunnaa taaghiin

5303.verse: 'Asaa rabbunaaa any yubdilanaa khairam minhaaa innaaa ilaa rabbinaa raaghibuun

5304.verse: Kazaalikal azaab, wa la'azaabul aakhirati akbar; law kaanuu ya'lamuun

5310.verse: Am lakum aymaanun 'alainaa baalighatun ilaa yawmil qiyaamati inna lakum lamaa tahkumuun

5312.verse: Am lahum shurakaaa'u falyaatuu bishurakaaa 'ihim in kaanuu saadiqiin

5313.verse: Yawma yukshafu 'am saaqinw wa yud'awna ilas sujuudi falaa yastatii'uun

5314.verse: Khaashi'atan absaaruhum tarhaquhum zillatunw wa qad kaanuu yud'awna ilassujuudi wa hum saalimuun

5315.verse: Fazarnii wa many yukazzibu bihaazal hadiisi sanastad rijuhum min haisu laa ya'lamuun

5316.verse: Wa umlii lahum; inna kaidii matiin

5317.verse: Am tas'aluhum ajran fahum mim maghramim musqaluun

5319.verse: Fasbir lihkmi rabbika wa laa takun kasaahibil buut; iz naadaa wa huwa makzuum

5320.verse: Law laaa an tadaara kahuu ni'matum mir rabbihii lanubiza bil'araaa'i wa huwa mazmuum

5322.verse: Wa iny-yakaadul laziina kafaruu la-yuzliquunaka biabsaarihim lammaa saml'uz-Zikra wa yaquuluuna innahuu lamajnuun

5323.verse: Wa maa huwa illaa zikrul lil'aalamiin

5329.verse: Wa ammaa 'Aadun fa uhlikuu biriihin sarsarin 'aatiyah

5330.verse: Sakhkharahaa 'alaihim sab'a la yaalinw wa samaaniyata ayyaamin husuuman fataral qawma fiihaa sar'aa ka annahum a'jaazu nakhlin khaawiyah

5332.verse: Wa jaaa'a Firawnu wa man qablahuu wal mu'tafikaatu bilhaati'ah

5333.verse: Fa'ansaw Rasuula Rabbihim fa akhazahum akhzatar raabiyah

5334.verse: Innaa lammaa taghal maaa'u hamalnaakum fil jaariyah

5335.verse: Linaj'alahaa lakum tazki ratanw-wa ta'iyahaa unzununw waa'iyah

5336.verse: Fa izaa nufikha fis suuri nafkhatunw waahidah

5337.verse: Wa humilatil ardu wal jibaalu fadukkataa dakkatanw waahidah

5340.verse: Wal malaku 'alaaa arjaaa'ihaa; wa yahmilu 'Arsha Rabbika fawqahum yawma'izin samaaniyah

5341.verse: Yawma'izin tu'raduuna laa takhfaa min kum khaafiyah

5342.verse: Fa ammaa man uutiya kitaabahuu biyamiinihii fa yaquulu haaa'umuq ra'uu kitaabiyah

5347.verse: Kuluu washrabuu haniie'am bimaaa aslaftum fil ayyaamil khaliyah

5348.verse: Wa ammaa man uutiya kitaabahuu bishimaalihii fa yaquulu yaalaitanii lam uuta kitaaabiyah

5355.verse: Summa fii silsilatin zar'uhaa sab'uuna ziraa'an faslukuuh

5359.verse: Wa laa ta'aamun illaa min ghisliin

5364.verse: Wa ma huwa biqawli shaa'ir; qaliilam maa tu'minuun

5365.verse: Wa laa biqawli kaahin; qaliilam maa tazakkaruun

5372.verse: Wa inna lana'lamu anna minkum mukazzibiin

5379.verse: Ta'rujul malaaa'ikatu war ruuhu ilaihi fii yawmin kaana miqdaaruhuu khamsiina alfa sanah

5386.verse: Yubassaruunahum; ya waddul mujrimu law yaftadii min 'azaabi yawma'izim bibaniih

5389.verse: Wa man fil ardi jamii'an summa yunjiih

5405.verse: Illaa 'alaaa azwaajihim aw maa malakat aymaanuhum fainnahum ghairu maluumiin

5406.verse: Famanib taghaa waraaa'a zaalika fa ulaaa'ika humul 'aaduun

5407.verse: Wallaziina hum li amaa naatihim wa 'ahdihim raa'uun

5411.verse: Famaa lil laziina kafaruu qibalaka muhti'iin

5413.verse: Ayatma'u kullum ri'im minhum anyyudkhala jannata Na'iim

5414.verse: Kallaaa innaa khalaq nahum mimmaa ya'lamuun

5415.verse: Falaaa uqsimu bi Rabbil mashaariqi wal maghaaribi innaa laqaadiruun

5416.verse: 'Alaaa an nubaddila khairam minhum wa maa Nahnu bimasbuuqiin

5417.verse: Fazarhum yakhuuduu wa yal'abuu hattaa yulaaquu yaw mahumul lazii yuu'aduun

5418.verse: Yawma yakhrujuuna minal ajdaasi siraa'an ka anna hum ilaa nusubiny yuufiduun

5419.verse: Khaashi'atan absaaruhum tarhaquhum zillah; zaalikal yawmul lazii kaanuu yuu'aduun

5420.verse: Innaaa arsalnaa nuuhan ilaa qawmihii an anzir qawmaka min qabli any yaatiyahum 'azaabun aliim

5421.verse: Qaala yaa qawmi innii lakum naziirum mubiin

5422.verse: Ani'udul laaha watta quuhu wa atii'uun

5423.verse: Yaghfir lakum min zunuubikum wa yu'akhkhirkum ilaaa ajalim musammaa; innaa ajalal laahi izaa jaaa'a laa yu'akhkhar; law kuntum ta'lamuun

5424.verse: Qaala rabbi innii da'awtu qawmii lailanw wa naharaa

5425.verse: Falam yazid hum du'aaa 'iie illaa firaaraa

5426.verse: Wa inii kullamaa da'awtuhum litaghfira lahum ja'aluuu asaabi'ahum fii aazaanihim wastaghshaw siyaabahum wa asaarruu wastakbarus tikbaaraa

5428.verse: Summaa inniie a'lantu lahum wa asrartu lahum israaraa

5429.verse: Faqultus taghfiruu Rabakam innahuu kaana Ghaffaaraa

5431.verse: Wa yumdidkum bi am waalinw wa baniina wa yaj'al lakum Jannaatinw wa yaj'al lakum anhaaraa

5432.verse: Maa lakum laa tarjuuna lillaahi waqaaraa

5434.verse: Alam taraw kaifa khalaqal laahu sab'a samaawaatin tibaaqaa

5435.verse: Wa ja'alal qamara fiihinna nuuranw wa ja'alash shamsa siraajaa

5437.verse: Summa yu'iidukum fiihaa wa ukhrijukum ikhraajaa

5440.verse: Qaala nuuhur Robbi innahum 'asawnii wattaba'uu mal lam yazid hu maaluhuu wa waladuhuuu illaa khasaara

5442.verse: Wa qaaluu laa tazarunna aalihatakum wa laa tazarunna Waddanw wa laa Suwaa'anw wa laa Yaghuusa wa Ya'uuqa wa Nasraa

5443.verse: Wa qad adalluu kasii ranw wa laa tazidiz zaalimiina illaa dalaalaa

5444.verse: Mimmaa khatiie' aatihim ughriquu fa udkhiluu Naaran falam yajiduu lahum min duunil laahi ansaaraa

5445.verse: Wa qaala nuuhur Rabbi laa tazar 'alal ardi minal kaafiriina daiyaaraa

5446.verse: Innaka in tazarhum yudil luu 'ibaadaka wa laa yaliduuu illaa faajiran kaffaaraa

5447.verse: Rabbigh fir lii wa liwaa lidaiya wa liman dakhala baitiya mu'minanw wa lil mu'miniina wal mu'minaati wa laa tazidiz zaalimiina illaa tabaaraa

5448.verse: Qul uuhiya ilaiya annna hustama'a nafarum minal jinnni faqaaluuu innaa sami'naa quraanan 'ajabaa

5449.verse: Yahdiie ilar rushdi fa aamannaa bihii wa lan nushrika bi rabbinaaa ahadaa

5450.verse: Wa annahuu Ta'aalaa jaddu Rabbinaa mat takhaza saahibatanw wa la waladaa

5451.verse: Wa annahuu kaana yaquulu safiihunaa 'alal laahi shatataa

5452.verse: Wa annaa zanannaaa al lan taquulal insu wal jinnu 'alal laahi kazibaa

5453.verse: Wa annahuu kaana rijaa lum minal insi ya'uuzuuna birijaalim minal jinni fazaa duuhum rahaqaa

5454.verse: Wa annahum zannuu kamaa zanantum al lany yab'asal laahu ahadaa

5455.verse: Wa annaa lamasnas sa maaa'a fa wajadnaahaa muli'at harasan shadiidanw wa shuhubaa

5456.verse: Wa annaa kunnaa naq'udu minhaa maqaa'ida lis'sam'i famany yastami'il aana yajid lahuu shihaabar rasada

5457.verse: Wa annaa laa nadriie asharrun uriida biman fil ardi am araada bihim rabbuhum rashadaa

5458.verse: Wa annaa minnas saalihuuna wa minnaa duuna zaalika kunnaa taraaa'ilqa qidadaa

5459.verse: Wa annaa zanannaaa al lan nu'jizal laaha fil ardi wa lan nu'jizahuu harabaa

5460.verse: Wa annaa lammaa sami'nal hudaaa aamannaa bihii famany yu'mim bi rabbihii falaa yakhaafu bakhsanw wa laa rahaqaa

5461.verse: Wa annaa minnal muslimuuna wa minnal qaasituuna faman aslama fa ulaaa'ika taharraw rashadaa

5462.verse: Wa ammal qaasituuna fa kaanuu li jahannama hatabaa

5463.verse: Wa alla wis taqaamuu 'alat tariiqati la asqaynaahum maa'an ghadaqaa

5464.verse: Linaftinahum fiih; wa many yu'rid 'an zikri rabbihii yasluk hu 'azaaban sa'adaa

5465.verse: Wa annal masaajida lillaahi falaa tad'uu ma'al laahi ahadaa

5466.verse: Wa annahuu lammaa qaama 'adul laahi yad'uuhu kaaduu yakuunuuna 'alaihi libadaa

5467.verse: Qul innamaaa ad'uu rabbii wa laaa ushriku bihiie ahadaa

5468.verse: Qul innii laaa amliku lakum darranw wa laa rashadaa

5469.verse: Qul innii lany yujiiranii minal laahi ahad, wa lan ajida min duunihii multahadaa

5470.verse: Illaa balaagham minal laahi wa risaalaatih; wa many ya'sil laaha wa rasuulahuu fa inna lahuu naara jahannama khaalidiina fiihaaa abadaa

5471.verse: Hattaaa izaa ra aw maa yuu'aduuna fasaya'lamuuna man ad'afu naasiranw wa aqallu 'adadaa

5472.verse: Qul in adriie a qariibum maa tuu'aduuna am yaj'alu lahuu rabbiie amadaa

5473.verse: 'Aalimul ghaibi falaa yuzhiru alaa ghaibihiie ahadaa

5474.verse: Illaa manir tadaa mir rasuulin fa innahuu yasluku mim baini yadihi wa min khalfihii rasadaa

5475.verse: Liya'lama an qad ablaghuu risaalaati rabbihim wa ahaata bima ladihim wa ahsaa kulla shai'in 'adadaa
