5479.verse: Aw zid 'alaihi wa rattilil Qur'aana tartiila

5481.verse: Inn naashi'atal laili hiya ashadddu wat anw wa aqwamu qiilaa

5482.verse: Inna laka fin nahaari sabhan tawiilaa

5483.verse: Wazkuris ma rabbika wa tabattal ilaihi tabtiilaa

5484.verse: Rabbul mashriqi wal maghriibi laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fattakhizhu wakiilaa

5485.verse: Wasbir 'alaa maa yaquu luuna wahjurhum hajran jamiilaa

5486.verse: Wa zarnii walmukaz zibiina ulin na'mati wa mahhilhum qaliilaa

5488.verse: Wa ta'aaman zaa ghussa tinw wa'azaaban aliimaa

5489.verse: Yawma tarjuful ardu waljibaalu wa kaanatil jibaalu kasiibam mahiilaa

5490.verse: Innaa arsalnaaa ilaikum rasuulan shahidan 'alikum kamaaa arsalnaaa ilaa Fir'awna Rasuulna

5491.verse: Fa'asaa Fir'awnur Rasuula fa akhaznaahu akhzanw wabiilaa

5492.verse: Fakaifa tattaquuna in kafartum yawmany yaj'alul wildaana shiiba

5493.verse: Assamaaa'u munfatirum bih; kaana wa'duhuu maf'uula

5494.verse: Inna haazihii tazkiratun fa man shaaa'at takhaza ilaa Rabbihii sabiilaa

5495.verse: Inna Rabbaka ya'lamu annaka taquumu adnaa min sulusa yil laili wa nisfahuu wa sulusahuu wa taaa'ifatum minal laziina ma'ak; wal laahu yuqaddirul laila wanna haar; 'alima al lan tuhsuuhu fataaba 'alaikum faqra'uu maa tayassara minal quraan; 'alima an sa yakuunu minkum mardaa wa aakharuuna yadribuuna fil ardi yabtaghuuna min fadlil laahi wa aakharuuna yuqaatiluuna fii sabiilil laahi faqra'uu ma tayassara minhu wa aqiimus salaata wa aatuz zakaata wa aqridul laaha qardan hasanaa; wa maa tuqadimuu li anfusikum min khairin tajiduuhu 'indal laahi huwa khayranw wa a'zama ajraa; wastaghfirul laahaa innal laaha ghafuurur rahiim.

5519.verse: Faqaala in haazaaa illaa sihruny yu'sar

5526.verse: Wa maaja''alnaaa As haaban naari illaa malaaa 'ikatanw wa maa ja'alnaa 'iddatahum illaa fitnatal lillaziina kafaruu liyastayqinal laziina uutul kitaaba wa yazdaadal laziina aamanuuu iimaananw wa laa yartaabal laziina uutul kitaaba walmu'minuuna wa liyaquulal laziina fii quluu bihim maradunw walkaafiruuna maazaaa araadal laahu bihaazaa masalaa; kazaalika yudillul laahu many yashaaa'u wa yahdii many yashaaa'; wa maa ya'lamu junuuda rabbika illaa huu; wa maa hiya illaa zikraa lil bashar

5532.verse: Liman shaaa'a minkum any yataqaddama aw yata akhkhar

5541.verse: Wa kunnaa nukazzibu bi yawmid Diin

5547.verse: Bal yuriidu kullum ri'im minhum any yu'taa suhufam munashsharah

5551.verse: Wa maa yazkuruuna illaaa any yashaaa'al laah; Huwa ahlut taqwaa wa ahlul maghfirah

5553.verse: Wa laaa uqsimu bin nafsil lawwaamah

5561.verse: Yaquulul insaanu yaw ma 'izin aynal mafarr

5564.verse: Yunabba 'ul insaanu yawma 'izim bimaa qaddama wa akhkhar

5567.verse: Laa tuharrik bihii lisaa naka lita'jala bih

5569.verse: Fa izaa qaraanaahu fattabi' qur aanah

5588.verse: Alam yaku nutfatam mim maniyyiny yumnaa

5590.verse: Faja'ala minhuz zawjayniz zakara wal unsaa

5591.verse: Alaisa zaalika biqaadirin 'alaaa any yuhyiyal mawtaa

5592.verse: Hal ataa 'alal insaani hiinum minad dahri lam yakun shai'am mazkuuraa

5593.verse: Innaa khalaqnal insaana min nutfatin amshaajin nabta liihi faja'alnaahu samii'am basiiraa

5594.verse: Innaa hadainaahus sabiila immaa shaakiranw wa immaa kafuura

5595.verse: Innaaa a'tadnaa lilkaa firiina salaasila wa aghlaalanw wa sa'iiraa

5596.verse: innal abraara yashra buuna min kaasin kaana mizaa juhaa kaafuuraa

5598.verse: Yuufuuna binnazri wa yakhaafuuna yawman kaana sharruhuu mustatiiraa

5599.verse: Wa yut''imuunat ta'aama 'alaa hubbihii miskiinanw wa yatemanw wa asiiraa

5600.verse: Innaamaa nut'imukum li wajhil laahi laa nuriidu minkum jazaaa'anw wa laa shukuuraa

5601.verse: Innaa nakhaafu mir Rabbinna Yawman 'abuusan qamtariiraa

5602.verse: Fa waqaahumul laahu sharra zaalikal yawmi wa laqqaahum nadratanw wa suruuraa

5603.verse: Wa jazaahum bimaa sabaruu janatanw wa hariiraa

5604.verse: muttaki'iina fiiha 'alal araaa 'iki laa yarawna fiihaa shamsanw wa laa zamhariiraa

5605.verse: Wa daaniyatan 'alaihim zilaaluhaa wa zullilat qutuufu haa tazliila

5606.verse: Wa yutaafu 'alaihim bi aaniyatim min fiddatinw wa akwaabin kaanat qawaariiraa

5608.verse: Wa yusawna fiihaa kaasan kaana mizaajuhaa zanjabiilaa

5610.verse: Wa yatuufu 'alaihim wildaanum mukhalladuuna izaa ra aytahum hasibtahum lu'lu 'am mansuura

5611.verse: Wa izaa ra ayta summa ra ayta na'iimanw wa mulkan kabiira

5612.verse: 'Aaliyahum siyaabu sundusin khudrunw wa istabraq, wa hulluuu asaawira min fiddatinw wa saqaahum Rabbuhum sharaaban tahuuraa

5613.verse: Innaa haazaa kaana lakum jazz 'anw wa kaana sa'yukum mashkuuraa

5615.verse: Fasbir lihukmi Rabbika wa laa tuti' minhum aasiman aw kafuuraa

5616.verse: Wazkuris ma Rabbika bukratanw wa asiilaa

5617.verse: Wa minal laili fasjud lahuu wa sabbihhu lailan tawiilaa

5618.verse: Inna haaa'ulaa'i yuhibbuuna 'aajilata wa yazaruuna waraaa'ahum yawman saqiilaa

5619.verse: Nahnu khalaqnaahum wa shadadnaaa asrahum wa izaa shi'naa baddalnaaa amsaala hum tabdiilaa

5620.verse: Inna haazihii tazkiratun fa man shaaa'at takhaza ilaa rabbihii sabiila

5621.verse: Wa maa tashaaa'uuna illaa anyyashaaa'al laah; innal laahaa kaana'Aliiman Hakiima

5622.verse: Yudkhilu mai yashaaa'u fii rahmatih; wazzaalimiina a'adda lahum 'azaaban aliimaa

5636.verse: Wa maaa adraaka maa yawmul fasl

5649.verse: Wa ja'alnaa fiihaa rawaasiya shaamikhaatinw wa asqainaakum maaa'an furaataa

5651.verse: Intaliquuu ilaa maa kuntum bihii tukazzibuun

5652.verse: Intaliquuu ilaa zillin zii salaasi shu'ab

5653.verse: Laa zaliilinw wa laa yughnii minal lahab

5658.verse: Wa laa yu'zanu lahum fa ya'taziruun

5660.verse: Haaza yawmul fasli jama 'naakum wal awwaliin

5661.verse: Fa in kaana lakum kaidun fakiiduun

5665.verse: Kuluu washrabuu haniie 'am bimaa kuntum ta'maluun

5668.verse: Kuluu wa tamatta'uu qaliilan innakum mujrimuun

5670.verse: Wa izaa qiila lahumur ka'uu aa yarka'uun

5684.verse: Wa banaina fauqakum sab 'an shi daada

5686.verse: Wa anzalna minal m'usiraati maa-an saj-jaaja

5687.verse: Linukh rija bihii habbaw wana baata

5690.verse: Yauma yun fakhu fis-suuri fataa tuuna afwaaja

5691.verse: Wa futiha tis samaa-u fakaanat abwaaba

5692.verse: Wa suyyi raatil jibaalu fa kaanat saraaba

5696.verse: Laa ya zuuquuna fiiha bar daw walaa sharaaba

5700.verse: Wa kazzabu bi aayaa tina kizzaba

5701.verse: Wa kulla shai-in ahsai naahu kitaa ba

5702.verse: Fa zuuquu falan-nazii dakum ill-laa azaaba

5707.verse: Laa yasma'uuna fiha lagh waw walaa kizzaba

5709.verse: Rabbis samaa waati wal ardi wa maa baina humar rahmaani laa yam likuuna minhu khi taaba

5710.verse: Yauma yaquu mur ruuhu wal malaa-ikatu saf-fal laa yata kalla muuna illa man azina lahur rahmaanu wa qaala sawaaba

5711.verse: Zaalikal yaumul haqqu faman shaa-at ta khaaza ill-laa rabbihi ma-aaba

5712.verse: In naa anzar naakum azaaban qariibaiy-yauma yan zurul marr-u maa qaddamat yadaahu wa ya quulul-kaafiru yaa lai tanii kuntu turaaba

5722.verse: Ya quu luuna a-inna lamar duu duuna fil haafirah

5728.verse: Iz nadaahu rabbuhu bil waadil-muqad dasi tuwa

5731.verse: Wa ahdi yaka ila rabbika fatakh sha

5737.verse: Fa-akha zahul laahu nakalal aakhirati wal-uula.

5739.verse: A-antum a shaddu khalqan amis samaa-u banaaha.

5741.verse: Wa aghtasha lailaha wa akhraja duhaaha.

5747.verse: Yauma Yata zakkarul insaanu ma sa'aa.

5752.verse: Wa ammaa man khaafa maqaama Rabbihii wa nahan nafsa 'anil hawaa

5758.verse: Ka annahum Yawma yarawnahaa lam yalbasuuu illaa 'ashiyyatan aw duhaahaa

5761.verse: Wa maa yudriika la'allahu yaz zakkaa.

5762.verse: Au yaz zak karu fatanfa 'ahuz zikraa.

5823.verse: Wa laqad ra aahu bilufuqil mubiin

5825.verse: Wa maa huwa biqawli shaitaanir rajiim

5829.verse: Wa maa tashaaa'uuna illaaa ai yashaaa 'al laahu Rabbul 'Aalamiin

5835.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal insaaanu maa gharraka bi Rabbikal kariim

5837.verse: Fiie ayye suuratim maa shaaa'a rakkabak

5846.verse: Wa maaa adraaka maa Yawmud Diin

5847.verse: Summa maaa adraaka maa Yawmud Diin

5848.verse: Yawma laa tamliku nafsul linafsin shai'anw walamru yawma'izil lillaah

5851.verse: Wa izaa kaaluuhum aw wazanuuhum yukhsiruun

5855.verse: Kallaaa inna kitaabal fujjaari lafii Sijjiin

5860.verse: Wa maa yukazzibu bihiie illaa kullu mu'tadin asiim

5861.verse: Izaa tutlaa'alaihi aayaatunaa qaala asaatiirul awwaliin

5862.verse: Kallaa bal raana 'alaa quluubihim maa kaanuu yaksibuun

5863.verse: Kallaaa innahum 'ar Rabbihim yawma'izil lamah juubuun

5865.verse: Summa yuqaalu haazal lazii kuntum bihii tukazzibuun

5874.verse: Khitaamuhuu misk; wa fii zaalika falyatanaafasil Mutanaafisuun

5877.verse: Innal laziina ajramuu kaanuu minal laziina aamanuu yadhakuun

5879.verse: Wa izan qalabuuu ilaaa ahlihimun qalabuu fakihiin

5880.verse: Wa izaa ra awhum qaaluuu inna haaa'ulaaa'i ladaaal luun

5882.verse: Fal yawmal laziina aamanuu minal kuffaari yadhakuun

5884.verse: Hal suwwibal kuffaaru maa kaanuu yaf'aluun

5886.verse: Wa azinat li Rabbihaa wa huqqat

5888.verse: Wa alqat maa fiihaa wa takhallat

5889.verse: Wa azinat li Rabbihaa wa huqqat

5890.verse: Yaaa ayyuhal insaanu innaka kaadihun ilaa Rabbika kad han famulaaqiih

5891.verse: Fa ammaa man uutiya kitaabahuu biyamiinih

5894.verse: Wa ammaa man uutiya kitaabahuu waraaa'a zahrih

5899.verse: Balaaa inna Rabbahuu kaana bihii basiiraa

5905.verse: Wa izaa quri'a 'alaihimul Quraanu laa yasjuduun

5909.verse: Illal laziina aamanuu wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum ajrun ghairu mamnuun

5916.verse: Wa hum 'alaa maa yaf'aluuna bilmu 'miniina shuhuud

5917.verse: Wa maa naqamuu minhum illaaa aiyu'minuu billaahil 'aziizil Hamiid

5918.verse: Allazii lahuu mulkus samaawaati wal ard; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai 'in Shahiid

5919.verse: Innal laziina fatanul mu'miniina wal mu'minaati summa lam yatuubuu falahum 'azaabu Jahannama wa lahum 'azaabul hariiq

5920.verse: Innal laziina aamanuu wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum Jannaatun tajrii min tahtihal anhaar; zaalikal fawzul kabiir

5941.verse: Famaa lahuu min quwwatinw wa laa naasir

5955.verse: Illaa maa shaaa'al laah; innahuu ya'lamul jahra wa maa yakhfaa

5961.verse: Summa laa yamuutu fiihaa wa laa yahyaa

5966.verse: Inna haazaa lafis suhu fil uulaa

5973.verse: Laisa lahum ta'aamun illaa min darii'

5974.verse: Laa yusminu wa laa yughnii min juu'

5998.verse: Hal fii zaalika qasamul lizii hijr

5999.verse: Alam tara kaifa fa'ala rabbuka bi'aad

6001.verse: Allatii lam yukhlaq misluhaa fil bilaad

6002.verse: Wa samuudal laziina jaabus sakhra bil waad

6008.verse: Fa ammal insaanu izaa mab talaahu Rabbuhuu fa akramahuu wa na' 'amahuu fa yaquulu Rabbiie akraman

6009.verse: Wa ammaaa izaa mabtalaahu faqadara 'alaihi rizqahuu fa yaquulu Rabbiie ahaanan

6010.verse: Kalla bal laa tukrimuuu nal yatiim

6014.verse: Kallaaa izaaa dukkatil ardu dakkan dakka

6015.verse: Wa jaaa'a Rabbuka wal malaku saffan saffaa

6016.verse: Wa jiie'a yawma'izim bi jahannnam; Yawma 'iziny yatazakkarul insaanu wa annaa lahuz zikraa

6018.verse: Fa Yawma izil laa yu'azzibu 'azaabahuuu ahad

6019.verse: Wa laa yuusiqu wasaaqa huuu ahad

6037.verse: Aw it'aamun fii yawmin zii masghabah

6040.verse: Summa kaana minal laziina aamanuu wa tawaasaw bissabri wa tawaasaw bilmarhamah

6042.verse: Wallaziina kafaruu bi aayaatinaa hum as-haabul Mash'amah

6056.verse: Faqaala lahum Rasuulul laahi naaqatal laahi wa suqiyaahaa

6057.verse: Fakazzabuuhu fa'aqaruuhaa fadamdama 'alaihim Rabbuhum bizambihim fasaw waahaa

6061.verse: Wa maa khalaqaz zakara wal unthaa

6069.verse: Wa maa yughnii 'anhu maaluhuuu izaa taraddaa

6071.verse: Wa inna lanaa lal Aakhirata wal uulaa

6077.verse: Wa maa li ahadin 'indahuu min ni'matin tujzaaa

6082.verse: Ma wad da'aka rabbuka wa ma qalaa

6084.verse: Wa la sawfa y'utiika rabbuka fatarda

6085.verse: Alam ya jidka yatiiman fa aawaa

6086.verse: Wa wa jadaka daal lan fahada

6088.verse: Fa am mal yatiima fala taqhar

6089.verse: Wa am mas saa-ila fala tanhar

6090.verse: Wa amma bi ni'mati rabbika fahad dith

6102.verse: Laqad khalaqnal insaana fii ahsani taqwiim

6103.verse: Thumma ra dad naahu asfala saafiliin

6104.verse: Ill-lal laziina aamanuu wa 'amilus saalihaati; falahum ajrun ghairu mamnuun

6105.verse: Fama yu kaz zibuka b'adu bid diin

6107.verse: Iqra bismi rab bikal lazii khalaq

6119.verse: Ara-aita in kaz zaba wa ta walla

6120.verse: Alam y'alam bi-an nal lahaa yaraa

6121.verse: Kalla la illam yantahi la nasfa'am bin nasiyah

6127.verse: Wa maa adraaka ma lailatul qadr

6128.verse: Lailatul qadri khairum min alfii shahr

6129.verse: Tanaz zalul malaa-ikatu war ruuhu fiiha bi izni-rab bihim min kulli amr

6130.verse: Salaamun hiya hattaa mat la'il fajr

6131.verse: Lam ya kunil laziina kafaru min ahlil kitaabi wal mushri kiina mun fak kiina hattaa ta-tiya humul bayyinah

6132.verse: Rasuulum minal laahi yatlu suhufam mutahharah

6134.verse: Wa maa tafarraqal laziina uutul kitaaba il-la mim b'adi ma jaa-at humul baiyyinah

6135.verse: Wa maa umiruu il-la liy'abu dul laaha mukhlisiina lahud-diina huna faa-a wa yuqiimus salaahta wa yu-tuz zakaata; wa zaalika diinul qaiyimah

6136.verse: Innal laziina kafaru min ahlil kitaabi wal mushri kiina fii nari jahan nama khaali diina fiiha; ulaa-ika hum shar rul ba riiyah

6137.verse: Innal laziina aamanu wa 'amilus saalihaati ula-ika hum khairul bariiy yah

6138.verse: Jazaa-uhum inda rabbihim jan naatu 'adnin tajrii min tahtihal an haaru khalidiina fiiha abada; radiy-yallaahu 'anhum wa ra du 'an zaalika liman khashiya rabbah.

6139.verse: Izaa zul zilatil ardu zil zaalaha

6144.verse: Yawma iziy yas durun naasu ash tatal liyuraw a'maalahum

6145.verse: Famaiy ya'mal mithqala zarratin khai raiy-yarah

6154.verse: Wa innahu lihubbil khairi la shadiid

6155.verse: Afala ya'lamu iza b'uthira ma filqubuur

6157.verse: Inna rabbahum bihim yauma 'izil la khabiir

6161.verse: Yauma ya kuunun naasu kal farashil mabthuuth

6162.verse: Wa ta kuunul jibalu kal 'ihnil manfuush

6165.verse: Wa amma man khaffat mawa ziinuh

6179.verse: Il lal laziina aamanu wa 'amilus saali haati wa tawa saw bil haqqi wa tawa saw bis sabr

6183.verse: Kalla layum ba zanna fil hutamah

6189.verse: Alam tara kaifa fa'ala rabbuka bi ashaabil fiil

6190.verse: Alam yaj'al kai dahum fii tad liil

6192.verse: Tar miihim bi hi jaaratim min sij jiil

6197.verse: Allazi at'amahum min ju'inw-wa-aamana hum min khawf

6198.verse: Ara-aital lazii yu kazzibu bid diin

6200.verse: Wa la ya huddu 'alaa ta'amil miskiin

6215.verse: Wa ra-aitan naasa yadkhuluuna fii diinil laahi afwajah

6216.verse: Fa sab bih bihamdi rabbika was taghfir, innahu kaana tawwaaba

6217.verse: Tab bat yadaa abii Lahabinw-wa tabb

6218.verse: Maa aghna 'anhu maaluhu wa ma kasab

6219.verse: Sa yas laa naran zaata lahab

6228.verse: Wa min sharri ghasiqin iza waqab

6230.verse: Wa min shar ri haasidin iza hasad

6235.verse: Al lazii yuwas wisu fii suduurin naas
